It also offers a very nice hotel, but it is more expensive than other places.

text.fr: menus excellent crudités sublime accueille très attentionné dessert à gogo . . . . peut améliorer la carte vins . . . . .
text.en: Maison H is a little pearl in the middle of Bonapriso. Very good pastries at a very reasonable price, I love their signature cake. new collections come out regularly, ideal for a top-notch pastry ice cream, a downside for the simple croissant where I don't quite find the best of the French croissant. pay attention to the civil servant spirit of the service, which can be very good or very close, like this Easter morning, pastries only available at 9:00 a.m., it was 8:55 a.m., we imagine that we could have offered to go and get what we needed. wanted, which had to be ready in backlog shop, no. after the hour, still nothing, we imagine that someone could tell us that this will happen or not, no. Easter dessert this year will come from another house.

text.fr: j ' ai aimé la façon de prendre soin du client . la presence des employés de salle à chaque fois qu ' on n ' est dans le besoin , à faire des propositions des plats qui nous ont echappé de vu . vraiment correct ; j ' ai été conquise et je peux vous dire que je reviendrais chaque fois que je me trouverais à yaoundé . merci à toute l ' equipe , bonne continuation et surtout bonne année
text.en: finally a French breakfast the way we like it! ! ! Although we are open to the local culture, we like, from time to time, to find our haunts. they are there ! ! ! pastries like in France! the only ones of this quality in Cameroon, to my knowledge. the rest to match! ! ! of course the service is a little overwhelmed when customers are in a hurry! of course there are sometimes misses and delays. but once these inconveniences are over you have to admit that everything is good! ! !

text.fr: il y en a pour tous les goûts ! continental , anglais , africain , toujours avec des produits très frais et de grandes variétés . personnel absolument charmant et prévenant .
text.en: I am not a regular customer but the few occasions that have brought me to Maison H have always brought a lot of pleasure. good welcome, varied and good cuisine, very good ice creams and pastries. . . shelter !

text.fr: mon séjour a été mémorable . le safoutier est un bon restaurant le personnel est formidable et le menu était riche et varié . toutes mes félicitations .
text.en: maison h the must in Douala clean, chic establishment and very good pastries and ice creams. and the prices are very affordable. There were 14 of us who came. small downside to being able to be all together one of the security guards made us understand that we couldn't eat all together and he told me in an authoritarian tone to eat outside or to leave. another very understanding server solved the problem. As the tables became available he gathered us all in the same corner. thank you to him I forgot his name really well done to him. we were on vacation and especially as a family, humiliating us in this way was not professional or commercial at all. thank you to maison h for reconciling me with baking.

text.fr: ce restaurant vous propose midi et soir un buffet , alors tous les jours c ' est monotone même si des plats changent . globalement il est de très grande qualité , même si avec le temps les entrées se sont simplifiées service en salle pour vous changer les couverts ou assiette . le plus un large choix de vins aux verres en blanc rosé ou rouge .
text.en: small but clean space, poor service. no customer orientation. . . to improve. I hope my next visit will be excellent. thank you and merry christmas

text.fr: ce restaurant manque de quelchose : - de personnes chaleureuse - de musiques et d ' un maître de salle qui invite la découverte ! rien à voir ou revoir ! déçu par le personnel fatigué et non avenant !
text.en: environment . clean and cozy, quality of pastries and dishes incomparable, impeccable and fast service and polite, helpful, kind and above all clean employees, too bad there is not a perfect second “house”

text.fr: superbe déjeuner . service impeccable . sancerre parfait . un vrai moment de relaxation pour qui n ' est pas habitué a l ' effervescence de yaoundé , la tarte tatin à la a mangue est un des meilleurs desserts jamais degustés .
text.en: thin and light pancakes, the "must" for me and the welcome is correct. You just have to wear mosquito repellent to fully enjoy the terrace. I nevertheless recommend this friendly space.

text.fr: j ' ai eu l ' honneur de degusté au paradis culinaire du hilton au brunch du dimanche ! l ' accueil était paradisiaque et le buffet divin ! nous avons passé un moment sublime accompagner d ' une diversiter culinaire ! je vous invite a expérimenté ce moment ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !
text.en: very modern and clean setting, a little too "trendy" for my taste (black, gray and white, a little cold, as is the fashion everywhere at the moment), and unfortunately with much too strong air conditioning, we have the Feels like it's 14 degrees, you really need to bring a sweater or a shawl otherwise you won't be able to survive. the sandwiches and salads are delicious, beautifully served. the lumberjack baguette sandwich with beef carpaccio and the Thai burger are particularly good. the fruit juices are very good but very expensive and those indicated on the menu are rarely available, each time there are only one or two, announced by the waiter (well, that proves that they are fresh! ) . The cakes are magnificent, it's almost a shame to damage them by cutting them to eat them because they are so beautiful! This is true art! It's a pleasure to come and look at the window! and they are as good as they are beautiful. We buy some regularly to bring home. the ice creams are excellent too. the nougat with dried fruits and apricot coulis (usually made for the end of Ramadan) is to die for. the balls served are huge, not at all like in France. the price for meals (sandwiches) is quite expensive, fruit juices are also expensive, but the price of cakes, ice creams and bread is very fair, especially for the quality. the room service is good. on the other hand the system for buying bread and cakes and ice cream is a little complicated, slow and annoying: order, then go and pay, then come back to pick up the purchases at different places, when you take from three different counters it's complicated and the Waitresses are not efficient, it's a bit of a panic and we are often looked at as if we were going to leave without paying. . . to buy just a baguette I find it very complicated. and why sometimes put 6 waitresses behind a counter if the service is so inefficient? apart from this inconvenience, it is the most beautiful and best place in Douala to come and buy cakes, bread and ice cream. In fact, it's even one of the best places because even in Paris it could compete with the best pastries.

text.fr: le safoutier est le restaurant au style brasserie 1900 à ne pas confondre avec la partie buffet située à gauche après l ' entrée de l ' hôtel hilton . ce sont deux endroit bien distincts et la safoutier ne propose qu ' un service à table , à la carte ou au menu . le choix est très large , les plats sont variés et de qualité . un excellent restaurant à yaoundé , l ' un des meilleurs à mon goût . j ' y suis allé à de très nombreuses reprises et je n ' ai jamais été déçu . la carte change assez régulièrement . le personnel est parfait avec une mention spéciale au maitre d ' hôtel m . alfred pour l ' incomparable qualité de son professionnalisme et de son accueil .
text.en: clearly stands out from the competition (almost non-existent otherwise). very good quality. price at European level for slightly lower quality. but without it it is very complex to find high quality ingredients. Recommended if your wallet can keep up. the same goes for small catering.

text.fr: plusieurs options , choix disponibles , cuisine variés , la seule chose sa prends du temps pour remplacer une assiette vide au buffet . le prix du buffet et 20500cfa et une grande bouteille perrier 6500cfa soit l ' équivalant d ' environ 30 % du montant du buffet .
text.en: maison h is the address not to be missed when passing through Douala. the bakery is exceptional, not to mention the pastry. the dishes are varied and the products are fresh.

text.fr: bon restaurant , avec de bons poissons , et un personnel sympa . service un peu long . petit déjeuner bien aussi .
text.en: to create a “class” restaurant, with non-invigorating dishes and savory and sweet tarts, refined salads, various breads, stylish service

text.fr: variété des plats et service très correct avec une personnel dévoué , et attentif ; la fête de la bière ouverte aux résidents de l ' hôtel acueillis sans réservation est une très bonne initiative y compris la choucroute qui accompagne cette fête ; sans la choucroute il n ' y aurait ps de fêre de la bière . merci pour cette fête conviviale .
text.en: very pleasant setting. very good quality products pastries coffee tea bread cakes! magnificently elaborate presentation of dishes! You can have breakfast, lunch or dinner there. salads sandwich dishes the staff just needs to be more dynamic. the best in Douala. I highly recommend .

text.fr: on peut dire qu ' il y a un beau choix . belles viandes grillées , légumes frais , beau dessert et franchement le cadre est sympa . je pense vraiment que c ' est un des restaurants les plus agréable de la ville . ca n ' est pas donné mais bon . . .
text.en: I was very pleasantly surprised by the wide variety of products offered and especially the quality. even if it's just the simple traditional baguette at 400f CFA. excellent and good luck

text.fr: la nourriture est correcte , même au - dessus de la moyenne , mais cet endroit est fou cher ! ! il sert le petit déjeuner , le déjeuner et le dîner et un buffet changements peu ( ou pas du tout ) d ' un jour à l ' autre , et il faut payer les yeux de la tête pour manger ici !
text.en: I already went to Douala for a mission and a friend told me about the house located at rue Njojo in Bonapriso, and when I really arrived at the place I was very well received by the always smiling waiters and these famous pastries like chocolate chip cookies and the PDA ice cream sundae with its 1 scoop cookie etc. . . made me fall in love with Maison H, I strongly advise you to take a look and you will not regret it.

text.fr: ma famille et moi étions très satisfaits de la qualité du service , de l ' enthousiasme de marcelle et christelle , joseph et eddy
text.en: it's the dream place to have a good time. the dishes are delicious. and great service!

text.fr: je suis très contente d être passé au brunch ce dimanche . j ' ai été très émue de voir un si grand buffet avec avec un coin cameroun et européen . les mesures barrières respectées . le service de qualité avec des serveurs co me christelle , marcelle , calices et autres . je vous invite à y faire un tour .
text.en: If you are looking for a place to have tea and eat excellent pastries, Maison H is the perfect place. . . the service is efficient and the staff are very friendly. a little noisy during rush hours. ps: they also offer breakfasts, lunches and brunch

text.fr: délicieux repas en compagnie des " marginales " . rien à redire tout a été parfait ! mesures barrières respectées tant par le personnel ( christelle , liboire , jean daniel ) que par les clients . je recommande vivement . rdv le 04 pour le brunch new look .
text.en: a great place to have a cup of tea with family and friends. impeccable pastry. I especially liked the chocolate coating.

text.fr: accueil et service excellent ! un merci particulier à jean daniel et christelle pour la qualité du service . repas excellent et à très vite ! rdv le 4 ! ! !
text.en: I was happy to go there after discovering that the pastry chef had studied at Lenôtre. . . The setting is very nice although a little small for such an establishment. the windows are very attractive and the products displayed with care. What a disappointment to order a tiramisu and end up with a verrine with 3 layers of ice cream (vanilla, coffee and chocolate). we ordered tea and received hot water without the tea. . and we had to call on the waiter for the tea bag which, despite the high temperature of the water, barely tasted of lime. which is quite disappointing. apart from that, frozen desserts such as ice cream, sorbets and other frozen macaroons are of normal quality. I was left hungry unfortunately. . .

text.fr: fortune tatiana victor marcel ont été très professionnels le repas excellent et dans le respect de mesures barrières
text.en: probably given the quality and presentation. one ice cream parlor side, one pastry and restaurant side, double temptation. a grilled captain on a bed of vegetables caught my attention with delight.

text.fr: repas succulent et les hostesses tres professionelles avec un acceuil chaleureux , tatiana , rosine et marie
text.en: I had a pleasant time, in a pleasant setting and I appreciated each flavor like a good gourmand.

text.fr: service très impeccable , bonne nourriture ambiance chaleureuse à l ' accompagnie de marcelle , marie , daniel tatiana , appolinaire
text.en: maison h pluses - ideally located on Bonapriso, easy to access and convenient for parking - high quality dishes, numerous salads, meat, fish and prawn specialties - high-end pastries, French bread, ice cream at any time for families - modern decoration, even in the toilets, everything is qualitative - attentive and fast service. efficient staff, well dressed and attentive - top breakfast with dishes to choose from in addition to the continental offer such as omelettes for example - fair price for this quality, there is more expensive in Douala for less well in the less - area central a little noisy because closed and close to the tables - busy on Saturday therefore noisy

text.fr: entrée et dessert super goûteux . plats de résistance pauvres peut être à cause du covid . service convivial à souhait et entreprenant . les boissons à volonté sont une amélioration délicieuse . tout le monde est ravi . je recommande . en plus mesures barrières rigoureusement respectées . christelle est un amour de disponibilité . bon dimanche passé .
text.en: the welcome is pleasant, the setting is just delightful, and one thing to note, the service is particularly attentive. As for the menu, the preference goes to ice creams and sorbets which are varied and delicious! ! ! it's ideal for small pleasures.

text.fr: très bon accueil hôtesses très charmantes tatiana fortune christelle très bonne bouffe . . . . a venir découvrir le buffet varie afro européen . . . poulet choux gratine boeuf au poivre . . .
text.en: I had a traditional rare hamburger and I got gastroenteritis. I won't go back there again despite the beautiful decoration.

text.fr: un service impeccable un buffet excellent . cest toujours un plaisir d ' être chez vous hilton sutout accompagné de daniel ibrahim marie clotaire .
text.en: excellent pastry, to enjoy on site or to take away. snack possible. well-trained and attentive staff. pleasant setting. Open all day .

text.fr: top service . marie , ibrahim et voltaire . . . . merci beaucoup . a une prochaine fois . . . . le repas et service est juste au top
text.en: what a pleasure ! ! ! ! the pastries are more beautiful than the others and they are delicious! ! ! kusmi tea. . . . . a great address

text.fr: service accueil très chaleureux climat de convivialité . très beau buffet dessert aussi . et surtt satisfaite du service tata marcelle et me clotaire . merci encore le service du safoutier . !
text.en: I like the decoration of the room. it is a pleasant and elegant place. As for the food, I ordered pancakes, waffles and crepes with ice cream. Overall, it was a great experience. the food was ok.

text.fr: mon passage à ce resto fut incroyable par ces amples menus et surtout des déserts à régaler . le service est si accueillant car j ai rencontré une serveuse sur le nom de tata marcelle qui c est occupé de moins quand je voulais quelque chose , vraiment merci aussi à mr clotaire et j ai hâte de revenir .
text.en: we went there for lunch. we are in Europe after all. Parisian style. very necely decorated. great sandwiches and bread of differences. you can buy ice cream. coffee maker. cakes . etc erc. nice armosphere plentybof real expats that the price is 150. 00 euros. Very classy hotel.

text.fr: service excellent . marie la meilleure et mr . ibrahim aussi . plat de résistance moins n fournit vous pouvez faire mieux .
text.en: perfect and not too expensive ice cream. delicious desserts and the staff is very friendly. To eat a meal here, it's really very expensive. the staff are dressed in tuxes, everything is very chic and clean. equipped with Japanese electronic toilets are super nice, especially for an African country. It also offers a very nice hotel, but it is more expensive than other places.

text.fr: le service est performant . c ’ est un endroit paisible paisible le serveur clotaire est disponible et n ’ hésite pas à répondre à toutes mes préoccupations
text.en: good meal, but very unpleasant service, especially the room manager who spoke to us very badly and was incapable of handling a problem.

text.fr: le service est excellent . c ' est un endroit original pour la détente et pour manger en famille . les serveurs sont toujours disponibles .
text.en: nothing to complain about. welcome, setting, service, dishes, cellar. . . everything comes together to have a great evening

text.fr: détendu , paisible pour manger , discuter , cadre détendu , convivial , et très bon service par mr clotaire .
text.en: everything is professional. the room, the service, the dishes. the c is one of the addresses cited by those who live in Douala and they are right. the menu is varied, the wine cellar offers bottles at affordable prices. everything is in good taste without falling into the stuffy. anyway go ahead

text.fr: excellent de leopold . . . très bonne ambiance familiale . . . a faire a refaire . . . . la fontaine chocolat était tip top
text.en: a good restaurant with very pleasant and generous service (they often serve small plates for those who do not order a starter or desserts to accompany the others). very good food.

text.fr: je suis passé au hiltonyaoundé au resto le safoutier à l ' accueil une damme très serviable et pour le
text.en: Many thanks for your message and see you soon. the c’ team

text.fr: super moment passé au restaurant le safoutier . christelle et rehab ont été très gentilles et nous ont très bien accompagné durant ce moment . merci encore
text.en: one of the best restaurants in Douala, the products are fresh, the cuisine refined, it is very good value for money. A brunch is offered every other Sunday, don't miss it, it's worth the detour. I highly recommend this excellent address.

text.fr: soirée très conviviale avec une musique très douce . l . acceuil très chaleur de christelle et rahab . je pense que je reviendrai
text.en: one of the best French restaurants in Douala. great quality of products and preparation. careful service.

text.fr: très bon accueil , l ' hôtesse adelina toujours souriante et vraiment professionnelle . service impeccable avec un personnel toujours proche .
text.en: a very pleasant place for lunch and dinner, nice dishes with quality ingredients like the wok with Cameroon shrimp and Thai sauce with a very good Sancerre de Sancerre. excellent service in an ethnic setting that is a good mix with the cuisine

text.fr: super déjeuner ! un buffet avec plein de choix , un accueil au top , les employés étaient au petit soin , surtout léopold , marie , et christelle . je reviendrais ! ! merci à tous
text.en: charming decoration, a good choice of menu and finally a delicious, very tasty meal. a little expensive but the quality is there

text.fr: très bon buffet le dimanche . les serveurs sont très accueillants , en particulier sylvianne et christelle .
text.en: the plus points - restaurant ideally located in the heart of Douala, Bonapriso district, rather business and expat - pleasant ethnic decoration, large bamboo, gigantic Buddha, subdued lighting - local cuisine with Asian influence. We loved the Thai prawns with coconut rice - quick service as long as you order as an aperitif! - choice of quality wine. we liked the white from South Africa. as is often the case in Cameroon, avoid low quality French wines that are too expensive for what they are - as is often the case in smoking restaurants. really spoils the meal and the bill, too bad - sponsors are all present. chivas on the brand and ruinart champagne everywhere in the room and on the servers. excessive

text.fr: accueil hors du commun de solange staff très professionnel repas très variés plats local très apprécié j aime aussi la barbe a papa la musique dans l ensemble c est super merci
text.en: restaurant with zen and chic decor, top-notch cuisine and staff. quality products, whether food, wine or cocktails. Claire the owner is adorable and brings her restaurant to life in a thousand ways throughout the year (Christmas market, kids party, chic & shocking evening with DJ, brunch etc etc) it's one. A must when you are in Douala! ! !

text.fr: service de qualité , bon accueil et plats délicieux , musique au top ! ! ! merci à rahab pour la disponibilité !
text.en: super good discovery during our trip to Gabon. it's a welcoming restaurant, where the meals are just to die for without being too expensive! I recommend the place and especially if you like good food, go there!

text.fr: belle découverte culinaire ! je me suis régalée . les plats étaient variés et délicieux par la même occasion .
text.en: very good restaurant, don't hesitate! This restaurant will be perfect whether for a meal with family, friends or colleagues. the team is smiling and available.

text.fr: se commentaire est adressé aux clients du hilton connaisez vous les conditions dans les dans les quelle travail le personnel du hilton ?
text.en: excellent meal with friends! from starter to dessert we loved everything (the French toast was a success). the menu has just been renewed and the choice is wide. the welcome and the service are very professional. the setting of the restaurant is very refined. It was a really good time. . .

text.fr: excellentaccueil de solange tres attentive elle est au top elle maitrise son boulot rien a redire sur la qualite du repas
text.en: The place is pretty and the food is good. However, hygiene there is questionable. If you like food poisoning, go for it.

text.fr: la bouffe est excellente et l ' accueil est cordial . la musique est un peu trop forte et gêne la conversation .
text.en: lounge setting, friendly and professional welcome. from the starter to the desert everything is excellent both in terms of the products and the preparation an unmissable restaurant in Douala to visit absolutely because a good culinary time guaranteed

text.fr: accueil chaleureux de solange bon service dans l ensemble millieu chaleureux très apprécié et recommandé à tous pour moi c est le top merci pour le staff
text.en: pleasant and relaxing setting welcoming and professional staff everything is there to have a good time the cocktails are successful and in addition to a menu there is a slate of suggestions everything is good and tasty whether it is the meat or the fish not to be missed and unmissable visit both for the feasts and the atmosphere

text.fr: très bel accueil de solange service de qualité de mari louise staff convivial repas somptueux prompte réaction de tous et toutes
text.en: friendly welcome the dishes are quite elaborate and tasty not too long to wait to be served the quantity and quality are there. I advise you to have a dessert which is excellent, a very good cellar with a wide choice of champagne and whiskey wines.

text.fr: accueil très professionnel et chaleureux . magnifique lieu très beau décor avec un buffet ouvert et un large menu . un personnel serviable et souriant dans un cadre paisible . une cuisine de bonne qualité au goût exquis
text.en: a superb setting for this restaurant which offers refined and very tasty cuisine. you can have a drink in the small lounge or at the bar before sitting down to eat.

text.fr: bel accueil de solange très bon repas varié . qualité du service : très poli et souriante . j ’ ai très apprécié et je pense que j ’ y reviendrai encore . vraiment merci
text.en: The decor of this establishment is superb. a small lounge welcomes you before sitting down to the table. the dishes are original and tasty, I was treated to a tomato chutney with a fish, magnificent. what about banana with spices for dessert? congratulations, I will come back with pleasure

text.fr: très attrayant . les servantes sont serviable et surtout respectueuse des choses . bien de choses à vo
text.en: a warm and attentive welcome. dishes (fish or meat) combine the pleasure of the eyes and that of the taste buds. in short, a pleasant place where there is a certain serenity. I recommend !

text.fr: très bon périt déjeuner et attention particulière venant de clotaire qui était vraiment très serviable et aimable
text.en: meals and services. I appreciated . go see too. you will not be disappointed . although the price. . . is a bit strong. the taste is worth the money.

text.fr: super petit déjeuner avec des viennoiseries parfaites . le tout dans un hôtel agréable avec un personnel aux petits soins et plein de bonne humeur .
text.en: soft and cozy atmosphere, very pleasant to meet up with friends or simply as a couple. the service is well provided and the welcome very warm. This is an address that I recommend because the dishes are well prepared and the daily specials are well selected. the team is available without being too present which allows you to always have privacy. Good luck! ! !

text.fr: cuisine de très bonne qualite , variee , bon service de l ' ensemble du personnel et surtout de marie louise .
text.en: very warm welcome, with a more than smiling owner. We enjoyed ourselves every time. very good restaurant for an evening with friends, family or as a couple. exquisite desserts. truly one of the best restaurants in Douala.

text.fr: tres tres acceuillante et sourriente l hotesse au nom de solange les mots me manquent pour decrire la beaute des desserts c est ce qu il faut pour un 5 etoiles de luxe merci encore
text.en: one of the best restaurants in Douala to eat with friends or family. the Sunday brunch is excellent, and the atmosphere is friendly. great decor, great staff! ! ! The menu is varied, the dishes are of good quality and very well presented.

text.fr: qualité des repas et service impeccables . les plats sont très copieux . merci à ivan pour sa gentillesse et son sourire .
text.en: Very nice restaurant, warm atmosphere, perfect welcome. . . Very good value for money ! ! ! ideal restaurant for romantic evenings or evenings with friends! and above all an incomparable brunch! ! ! ! in short, definitely worth testing :)

text.fr: buffet du 13 février au safoutier . excellent comme d habitude surtout les entrées et le dessert ainsi que le jus de fruit naturel . excellent service par marie louise qui était toujours à l ' écoute . bon souvenir
text.en: I went to eat there several times, the restaurant is magnificent in terms of decoration, the menu has something for everyone and it's really great, personally I love the Chinese salad! ! ! ! she rocks : ) . What's more, a great team, always smiling, very warm welcome! I highly recommend this restaurant.

text.fr: le buffet du dimanche est super bon . rien à redire . la table des entrées fait rêver . celle des desserts fait grossir a vue d ' oeil et les plats chauds sont de bonne qualite .
text.en: a perfect place for a couple’s evening, birthday meetings. Excellent cuisine, very good desserts (yum), a caring owner. . . truly my favorite in Douala

text.fr: très bon accueil un personnels souriants et attentif un buffet digne de ce nom nous avons adoré merci
text.en: I tried everything: dinner, lunch & brunch, as a couple, with family or friends! Each time I had a great time. the setting is pleasant, the warm welcome, a lounge area to have an aperitif, a smiling and dynamic dining room team. As for the kitchen, everything is there: the menu is tempting, the dishes are prepared with modernity without forgetting the gourmet and refined side and every week you can find the chef's suggestions. the prices of the card can sometimes seem high but the quality/price ratio is there! it's one of the city's flagship restaurants to discover without any hesitation! bonus: possibility of ordering tailor-made cakes for your private events. . . They are very beautiful and good!

text.fr: bel accueil , une très bonne ambiance , un personnel très émable et un buffet à couper le souffle et très delicieux
text.en: I recommend this restaurant, the food is very good (the woks are great!), the decor is magnificent and above all the owner is super friendly

text.fr: c est un joyau caché parfait pour un dîné un déjeuner c est vraiment somptueux comme buffet l accueil chaleureux par solange merci vraiment je le recommande à toutes personne qui voudrait découvrir
text.en: Having been on a humanitarian trip to Cameroon for 2 months, I find that this restaurant allows us to escape just for the time of a meal around French or Asian flavors. . . . a breath of fresh air when you're homesick. the reception and the owner are available, friendly and they meet our expectations. to recommend ! ! ! !

text.fr: buffet dominical varié , fin et copieux . de nouvelles découvertes à chaque fois . une tarte aux fraises à la frangipane particulièrement réussie ce dimanche .
text.en: magnificent place, superb decor, exemplary service and fantastic cuisine! I can only highly recommend this restaurant and of course with pleasure! I wish you a good stopover in this restaurant! rafael.

text.fr: très bon accueil , propreté irréprochable et très bonne qualité des produits , serveurs attentionnés et à l ’ écoute
text.en: I've been there twice already and the last time for a friend's birthday. and I don't find the food great. on the other hand the decor is just magnificent. apart from that. .

text.fr: restaurant parfait accueil chaleureux merci pour le somptueux repas c est waou ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ça est avec plaisir que je souhaiterai revenir même tout le temps
text.en: the best restaurant in Douala, by far, by the taste quality of these dishes, perfect welcome and service, all my congratulations to the chef and good luck

text.fr: je recommande une fois de plus ce restaurant qui contient un grand buffet et plusieurs variétés le personnel aussi est très accueillant je tien a remercier clotaire , sandrine ainsi que larissa qui font vraiment attention aux client et qui sont au petit soins
text.en: We came for lunch on a Sunday afternoon. after taking and bringing the drink orders, we were told that it was impossible to order a la carte and that there was only the possibility of having a brunch in this restaurant on Sunday lunchtime. not really what we were originally looking for, but once the drink orders were on the table, we accepted (but still, we could have been told before). already a little dampened by the prices of drinks/cocktails, more expensive than other restaurants in the city. Brunch didn't help. very, very, limited choice, some loose breads not really appetizing, for the breakfast side it is very poor it seems to me that there was just cereals, then for the "hot" part nothing very attractive, lukewarm quiches not very nicely presented, although quite good. a very basic tomato salad. chicken curry, pasta. . . honestly, nothing transcendent. but prices that are absolutely not worth what is offered. desserts which did not win us over either in presentation or taste. really, we should review either a reduction in price, or improve the choice and quality of dishes, because there, the price is really not justified. that said, pretty restaurant, very nice decoration, beautiful Zen/Buddha atmosphere, which we liked as soon as we entered. for the service, it was a buffet so obviously the waitresses were grouped together with their arms crossed watching people eat. brunch is really not recommended. see for the à la carte dishes. . .

text.fr: le petit déjeuner sous forme de buffet est excellent et varié ( les grands classiques européens et camerounais ) . les amateurs du petit déjeuner typique camerounais ne seront pas déçus : les beignets haricots bouillis y sont très bons . je recommande !
text.en: careful decoration. acceptable wine list. varied menu therefore correct. the place is clean. service: respectful cuisine: correct. atmosphere: friendly. suitable for business as well as for social or family concept: innovative and creative in the catering sector in Douala.

text.fr: le service est très accueillant , le cadre est confortable et le repas un véritable régal . j ' y reviendrai .
text.en: the food is good but not that good. the service and the setting are average and I find the atmosphere very sad for a restaurant

text.fr: très convivial . buffet très bon . acceuil parfait . service de qualité . j ' ai vraiment passé un bon moment en famille .
text.en: a very warm welcome with small snacks during the aperitif, the rest with a very complete meal menu which makes you want to eat everything. choice of tournedos and scallops, excellent! ! ! ! the wine by the glass was perfect and at a good temperature calvados and special mention for the tea. the bill is quite expensive but given the quality of the service, nothing to complain about. the very nice decor, with large round tables (friendly) to redo

text.fr: bon accueil , personnel agréable et professionnel , espace apaisant avec un groupe musical en live et de bon repas locaux et internationaux .
text.en: awesome . . . don't miss the eclipse for dessert and the Sunday brunch. a pleasant and fast service with excellent value for money.

text.fr: décor magnifique , accueil chaleureux et repas excellent c ’ est un lieu adéquat pour des déjeuners entre amis ou d ’ affaire et surtout un excellent rapport qualité - prix . fortement recommandé .
text.en: very welcoming and warm setting! ! a very charming owner who takes great care! ! the meal was very good, drinks were even offered! ! we will return with joy! ! ! !

text.fr: tres bon buffet : belle entrée simple et légère avec sauce bonne organisation et serveurs accueillants et serieux . merci pour l ’ accueil et la propreté , pas de mouches . que du bonheur !
text.en: excellent dishes, excellent atmosphere, very pleasant service, only downside. . . . Only 1 bottle of ruinart in the cellar! ! but we don't blame them because for our birthday party the management offered us nice desserts! No ?

text.fr: j ’ ai beaucoup aimé les plats camerounais et le service est hyper rapide et satisfaisant . je recommande fortement
text.en: I found myself there with friends who knew the place and highly recommended it. the setting is indeed very nice (all the furniture and accessories are imported from Indonesia), but I found the meal average, and the prices far too high. 30,000 frs per person without wine

text.fr: un très bon accueil , le petit déjeuner est très bon et les serveurs sont toujours très aimables et accueillants .
text.en: nothing when entering the restaurant, we travel and we feel good there. the welcome is warm. we have a real moment of relaxation. it's a feast for the eyes and taste buds as soon as the plates arrive.

text.fr: très bel accueil par solange convivialité au restaurant très bon plat africain et asiatique star parfait vraiment un seul mot merci
text.en: this restaurant is a refinement for the palate, a pleasure for the eyes. a magnificent setting, an exceptional wine cellar and a menu await you there and will seduce you.

text.fr: accueil super service irréprochable bonne enbiance pointée d une bonne musique pour tout couronner d un bon repas merci encore
text.en: the setting is in the same sense as the cozii, offbeat and retro while being warm, I who am difficult and very critical, the food is very good, the service is very good and the owner is very friendly and warm it is a setting relaxing and a pleasure for the taste buds! ! !

text.fr: le resto tres conviviale . le personnel accueillant gentil et souriant . merci a larissa et marie louise .
text.en: new restaurant, friendly and refined setting, tempting menu, however the menu and the dishes need to be worked on, but it will undoubtedly be an excellent restaurant in a short time, it still has a few adjustments. a mention for the chocolate/mint cake which is really excellent! on the other hand the prices of aperitifs are exorbitant, for example the mojito at 8. 500 f / 13 euros is excessive! ! !

text.fr: super bien servi accueil tres chaleureux plats très bien fais je dirais excellent encore merci aux staff en particulier larissa , adeline , marcel , dominique , emmanuel , gilles etc . . .
text.en: the food was really great, the environment too. the other interesting point is that the restaurant is in Bonapriso and very well located

text.fr: bonne accueil , très bon buffet très bon service bref excellent de meilleur met traditionnelle le safoutier c ' est juste excellent
text.en: wow, so when you arrive you can sit at the bar or lounge for a drink or a bite. fine, then select what you want from the menu. then wait. . . don't get me wrong, from what I've seen and tasted, everything is delicious, it just takes a while to arrive. good times, very good times, see you soon!

text.fr: excellent accuei ( super travail christelle ! - ) l , cuisine variée et d ' excellent niveau des entrées au dessert : bravo ! parfait après une bonne journée de travail
text.en: Run and owned by mother and daughter, charming and very accommodating. unfortunately, like most restaurants in Douala, it depends on stocks and stock availability. great when things are going well, recovered from an unfortunate fire. great relaxed place but staff need more training.

text.fr: on a passé un très bon moment . de l ' équipe , au repas à l ' ambiance musicale ! on reviendra . très beau cadre
text.en: I had a good business lunch in this good level of Douala restaurant. the quality of the food was good, especially the barracuda.

text.fr: le petit déjeuner est impeccable et les serveurs apportent la chaleur au clients vrement il sont a la hauteurs
text.en: good meal, but very unpleasant service, especially the room manager who spoke to us very badly and was incapable of handling a problem.

text.fr: l ' argent ne vaut pas la qualité du service rendu . c ' était merveilleux de déguster les mets d ' ici et d ' ailleurs . nous avons passé un moment inoubliable
text.en: nothing to complain about. welcome, setting, service, dishes, cellar. . . everything comes together to have a great evening

text.fr: c ’ est un excellent restaurant qui sait mettre en valeur autant le cuisine camerounaise que celle des autres pays . le buffet est extrêmement varié et les produits sont tous frais .
text.en: everything is professional. the room, the service, the dishes. the c is one of the addresses cited by those who live in Douala and they are right. the menu is varied, the wine cellar offers bottles at affordable prices. everything is in good taste without falling into the stuffy. anyway go ahead

text.fr: très beau moment passé à ce restaurant . j ' ai apprécié la politesse et le professionnalisme des hôtesses . continuez comme ça . merci .
text.en: a good restaurant with very pleasant and generous service (they often serve small plates for those who do not order a starter or desserts to accompany the others). very good food.

text.fr: je me retrouve ce soir au safoutier yaounde hilton en famille grâce à un concours sur facebook . soirée excellente , le cadre agréable et accueillant , le service impeccable , le buffet et toutes les saveurs proposées juste un délice pour le palais de tous gourmets . l ' orchestre de vrais professionnels de l ' art de la musique , les percussions . en général un avis excellent , merci au safoutier et à tout son personnel et bien - sûr aux bons soins de solange et de rahab .
text.en: Many thanks for your message and see you soon. the c’ team

text.fr: un brunch très appétissant . le cadre est accueillant et convivial . l ' ambiance est très cool . les menus sont très variés et excellents particulierement le dessert . le personnel est super sympathique et nous remercions liboire , sylviane et larissa pour ces moments particuliers .
text.en: one of the best restaurants in Douala, the products are fresh, the cuisine refined, it is very good value for money. A brunch is offered every other Sunday, don't miss it, it's worth the detour. I highly recommend this excellent address.

text.fr: c est avec grand sourire et amour que solange c est toujours occuper de nous je recommande ce restaurant a tous et toute service de qualité liboire maître d hôtel très proactif et son équipe repas très variés merci une rose pour solange merci merci
text.en: one of the best French restaurants in Douala. great quality of products and preparation. careful service.

text.fr: passé le contrôle sécurité , désormais nécessaire partout dans le monde , le hall présente un décor sobre et chaleureux . l ' accueil est très courtois et tout le personnel très disponible . le restaurant , aussi bien en intérieur que dehors près de la piscine , propose une cuisine variée et très bonne ( excellent petit - déjeuner ) . les chambres sont confortables avec une bonne climatisation bien que pas assez silencieuse . bar du dernier étage très agréable avec d ' excellentes musiques .
text.en: a very pleasant place for lunch and dinner, nice dishes with quality ingredients like the wok with Cameroon shrimp and Thai sauce with a very good Sancerre de Sancerre. excellent service in an ethnic setting that is a good mix with the cuisine

text.fr: c ' est waouuuu ! solage et clotaire , chapeau vous êtes super ! ! ! l ' accueil est le service sont au rendez - vous . je suis très très satisfait . allez de l ' avant
text.en: charming decoration, a good choice of menu and finally a delicious, very tasty meal. a little expensive but the quality is there

text.fr: accueil chaleureux par solange et le staff . repas délicieux qui invite a une prochaine visite très très heureux d être encore et encore avec vous mille merci
text.en: the plus points - restaurant ideally located in the heart of Douala, Bonapriso district, rather business and expat - pleasant ethnic decoration, large bamboo, gigantic Buddha, subdued lighting - local cuisine with Asian influence. We loved the Thai prawns with coconut rice - quick service as long as you order as an aperitif! - choice of quality wine. we liked the white from South Africa. as is often the case in Cameroon, avoid low quality French wines that are too expensive for what they are - as is often the case in smoking restaurants. really spoils the meal and the bill, too bad - sponsors are all present. chivas on the brand and ruinart champagne everywhere in the room and on the servers. excessive

text.fr: accueil cordial , personnel toujours très sympathique ! en outre le buffet pour le petit - déjeuner est varié et bien fourni .
text.en: restaurant with zen and chic decor, top-notch cuisine and staff. quality products, whether food, wine or cocktails. Claire the owner is adorable and brings her restaurant to life in a thousand ways throughout the year (Christmas market, kids party, chic & shocking evening with DJ, brunch etc etc) it's one. A must when you are in Douala! ! !

text.fr: salé , sucré , chaud , frais . . . l ' embarras du choix ! les produits sont frais et personnel très serviable .
text.en: super good discovery during our trip to Gabon. it's a welcoming restaurant, where the meals are just to die for without being too expensive! I recommend the place and especially if you like good food, go there!

text.fr: je ne trouve vraiment rien à redire , lorsque j ' ai besoin de me trouver avec des amis ou des collègues pour nous restaurer , dans un coin qui reuni à la fois : un grand professionnalisme du personnel , propreté , le menu tant qualitatif que varié , eh bien je ne cherche pas longtemps , le safoutier est le coin tout indiqué
text.en: very good restaurant, don't hesitate! This restaurant will be perfect whether for a meal with family, friends or colleagues. the team is smiling and available.

text.fr: un personnel toujours très sympa et aux petits soins et une cuisine raffinée ( les gambas . . . ! ! ! ) merci à tous frédéric bard
text.en: excellent meal with friends! from starter to dessert we loved everything (the French toast was a success). the menu has just been renewed and the choice is wide. the welcome and the service are very professional. the setting of the restaurant is very refined. It was a really good time. . .

text.fr: le personnel y est chaleureux et prévenant ( j ' ai même pu garder le stylo de l ' une des filles de salle ) ; la nourriture variée , délicate et goûteuse . . . des prix certes assez élevés . mais pour ce standing et cette ambiance très agréable , j ' aime tout simplement ce restaurant
text.en: The place is pretty and the food is good. However, hygiene there is questionable. If you like food poisoning, go for it.

text.fr: le service est bien . la nourriture est bien et il y en a pour tous les goûts , mais les prix sont exorbitant et dépasse de beaucoup ce qu ' on pourrait payer dans un hilton en amérique du nord .
text.en: lounge setting, friendly and professional welcome. from the starter to the desert everything is excellent both in terms of the products and the preparation an unmissable restaurant in Douala to visit absolutely because a good culinary time guaranteed

text.fr: menus excellent crudités sublime accueille très attentionné dessert à gogo . . . . peut améliorer la carte vins . . . . .
text.en: pleasant and relaxing setting welcoming and professional staff everything is there to have a good time the cocktails are successful and in addition to a menu there is a slate of suggestions everything is good and tasty whether it is the meat or the fish not to be missed and unmissable visit both for the feasts and the atmosphere

text.fr: j ' ai aimé la façon de prendre soin du client . la presence des employés de salle à chaque fois qu ' on n ' est dans le besoin , à faire des propositions des plats qui nous ont echappé de vu . vraiment correct ; j ' ai été conquise et je peux vous dire que je reviendrais chaque fois que je me trouverais à yaoundé . merci à toute l ' equipe , bonne continuation et surtout bonne année
text.en: friendly welcome the dishes are quite elaborate and tasty not too long to wait to be served the quantity and quality are there. I advise you to have a dessert which is excellent, a very good cellar with a wide choice of champagne and whiskey wines.

text.fr: il y en a pour tous les goûts ! continental , anglais , africain , toujours avec des produits très frais et de grandes variétés . personnel absolument charmant et prévenant .
text.en: a superb setting for this restaurant which offers refined and very tasty cuisine. you can have a drink in the small lounge or at the bar before sitting down to eat.

text.fr: mon séjour a été mémorable . le safoutier est un bon restaurant le personnel est formidable et le menu était riche et varié . toutes mes félicitations .
text.en: The decor of this establishment is superb. a small lounge welcomes you before sitting down to the table. the dishes are original and tasty, I was treated to a tomato chutney with a fish, magnificent. what about banana with spices for dessert? congratulations, I will come back with pleasure

text.fr: ce restaurant vous propose midi et soir un buffet , alors tous les jours c ' est monotone même si des plats changent . globalement il est de très grande qualité , même si avec le temps les entrées se sont simplifiées service en salle pour vous changer les couverts ou assiette . le plus un large choix de vins aux verres en blanc rosé ou rouge .
text.en: a warm and attentive welcome. dishes (fish or meat) combine the pleasure of the eyes and that of the taste buds. in short, a pleasant place where there is a certain serenity. I recommend !

text.fr: ce restaurant manque de quelchose : - de personnes chaleureuse - de musiques et d ' un maître de salle qui invite la découverte ! rien à voir ou revoir ! déçu par le personnel fatigué et non avenant !
text.en: meals and services. I appreciated . go see too. you will not be disappointed . although the price. . . is a bit strong. the taste is worth the money.

text.fr: superbe déjeuner . service impeccable . sancerre parfait . un vrai moment de relaxation pour qui n ' est pas habitué a l ' effervescence de yaoundé , la tarte tatin à la a mangue est un des meilleurs desserts jamais degustés .
text.en: soft and cozy atmosphere, very pleasant to meet up with friends or simply as a couple. the service is well provided and the welcome very warm. This is an address that I recommend because the dishes are well prepared and the daily specials are well selected. the team is available without being too present which allows you to always have privacy. Good luck! ! !

text.fr: j ' ai eu l ' honneur de degusté au paradis culinaire du hilton au brunch du dimanche ! l ' accueil était paradisiaque et le buffet divin ! nous avons passé un moment sublime accompagner d ' une diversiter culinaire ! je vous invite a expérimenté ce moment ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !
text.en: very warm welcome, with a more than smiling owner. We enjoyed ourselves every time. very good restaurant for an evening with friends, family or as a couple. exquisite desserts. truly one of the best restaurants in Douala.

text.fr: le safoutier est le restaurant au style brasserie 1900 à ne pas confondre avec la partie buffet située à gauche après l ' entrée de l ' hôtel hilton . ce sont deux endroit bien distincts et la safoutier ne propose qu ' un service à table , à la carte ou au menu . le choix est très large , les plats sont variés et de qualité . un excellent restaurant à yaoundé , l ' un des meilleurs à mon goût . j ' y suis allé à de très nombreuses reprises et je n ' ai jamais été déçu . la carte change assez régulièrement . le personnel est parfait avec une mention spéciale au maitre d ' hôtel m . alfred pour l ' incomparable qualité de son professionnalisme et de son accueil .
text.en: one of the best restaurants in Douala to eat with friends or family. the Sunday brunch is excellent, and the atmosphere is friendly. great decor, great staff! ! ! The menu is varied, the dishes are of good quality and very well presented.

text.fr: plusieurs options , choix disponibles , cuisine variés , la seule chose sa prends du temps pour remplacer une assiette vide au buffet . le prix du buffet et 20500cfa et une grande bouteille perrier 6500cfa soit l ' équivalant d ' environ 30 % du montant du buffet .
text.en: Very nice restaurant, warm atmosphere, perfect welcome. . . Very good value for money ! ! ! ideal restaurant for romantic evenings or evenings with friends! and above all an incomparable brunch! ! ! ! in short, definitely worth testing :)

text.fr: bon restaurant , avec de bons poissons , et un personnel sympa . service un peu long . petit déjeuner bien aussi .
text.en: I went to eat there several times, the restaurant is magnificent in terms of decoration, the menu has something for everyone and it's really great, personally I love the Chinese salad! ! ! ! she rocks : ) . What's more, a great team, always smiling, very warm welcome! I highly recommend this restaurant.

text.fr: variété des plats et service très correct avec une personnel dévoué , et attentif ; la fête de la bière ouverte aux résidents de l ' hôtel acueillis sans réservation est une très bonne initiative y compris la choucroute qui accompagne cette fête ; sans la choucroute il n ' y aurait ps de fêre de la bière . merci pour cette fête conviviale .
text.en: a perfect place for a couple’s evening, birthday meetings. Excellent cuisine, very good desserts (yum), a caring owner. . . truly my favorite in Douala

text.fr: on peut dire qu ' il y a un beau choix . belles viandes grillées , légumes frais , beau dessert et franchement le cadre est sympa . je pense vraiment que c ' est un des restaurants les plus agréable de la ville . ca n ' est pas donné mais bon . . .
text.en: I tried everything: dinner, lunch & brunch, as a couple, with family or friends! Each time I had a great time. the setting is pleasant, the warm welcome, a lounge area to have an aperitif, a smiling and dynamic dining room team. As for the kitchen, everything is there: the menu is tempting, the dishes are prepared with modernity without forgetting the gourmet and refined side and every week you can find the chef's suggestions. the prices of the card can sometimes seem high but the quality/price ratio is there! it's one of the city's flagship restaurants to discover without any hesitation! bonus: possibility of ordering tailor-made cakes for your private events. . . They are very beautiful and good!

text.fr: la nourriture est correcte , même au - dessus de la moyenne , mais cet endroit est fou cher ! ! il sert le petit déjeuner , le déjeuner et le dîner et un buffet changements peu ( ou pas du tout ) d ' un jour à l ' autre , et il faut payer les yeux de la tête pour manger ici !
text.en: I recommend this restaurant, the food is very good (the woks are great!), the decor is magnificent and above all the owner is super friendly

text.fr: ma famille et moi étions très satisfaits de la qualité du service , de l ' enthousiasme de marcelle et christelle , joseph et eddy
text.en: Having been on a humanitarian trip to Cameroon for 2 months, I find that this restaurant allows us to escape just for the time of a meal around French or Asian flavors. . . . a breath of fresh air when you're homesick. The reception and the owner are available, friendly and they meet our expectations. to recommend ! ! ! !

text.fr: je suis très contente d être passé au brunch ce dimanche . j ' ai été très émue de voir un si grand buffet avec avec un coin cameroun et européen . les mesures barrières respectées . le service de qualité avec des serveurs co me christelle , marcelle , calices et autres . je vous invite à y faire un tour .
text.en: magnificent place, superb decor, exemplary service and fantastic cuisine! I can only highly recommend this restaurant and of course with pleasure! I wish you a good stopover in this restaurant! rafael.

text.fr: délicieux repas en compagnie des " marginales " . rien à redire tout a été parfait ! mesures barrières respectées tant par le personnel ( christelle , liboire , jean daniel ) que par les clients . je recommande vivement . rdv le 04 pour le brunch new look .
text.en: I've been there twice already and the last time for a friend's birthday. and I don't find the food great. on the other hand the decor is just magnificent. apart from that. .

text.fr: accueil et service excellent ! un merci particulier à jean daniel et christelle pour la qualité du service . repas excellent et à très vite ! rdv le 4 ! ! !
text.en: the best restaurant in Douala, by far, by the taste quality of these dishes, perfect welcome and service, all my congratulations to the chef and good luck

text.fr: fortune tatiana victor marcel ont été très professionnels le repas excellent et dans le respect de mesures barrières
text.en: We came for lunch on a Sunday afternoon. after taking and bringing the drink orders, we were told that it was impossible to order a la carte and that there was only the possibility of having a brunch in this restaurant on Sunday lunchtime. not really what we were originally looking for, but once the drink orders were on the table, we accepted (but still, we could have been told before). already a little dampened by the prices of drinks/cocktails, more expensive than other restaurants in the city. Brunch didn't help. very, very, limited choice, some loose breads not really appetizing, for the breakfast side it is very poor it seems to me that there was just cereals, then for the "hot" part nothing very attractive, lukewarm quiches not very nicely presented, although quite good. a very basic tomato salad. chicken curry, pasta. . . honestly, nothing transcendent. but prices that are absolutely not worth what is offered. desserts which did not win us over either in presentation or taste. really, we should review either a reduction in price, or improve the choice and quality of dishes, because there, the price is really not justified. that said, pretty restaurant, very nice decoration, beautiful Zen/Buddha atmosphere, which we liked as soon as we entered. for the service, it was a buffet so obviously the waitresses were grouped together with their arms crossed watching people eat. brunch is really not recommended. see for the à la carte dishes. . .

text.fr: repas succulent et les hostesses tres professionelles avec un acceuil chaleureux , tatiana , rosine et marie
text.en: careful decoration. acceptable wine list. varied menu therefore correct. the place is clean. service: respectful cuisine: correct. atmosphere: friendly. suitable for business as well as for social or family concept: innovative and creative in the catering sector in Douala.

text.fr: service très impeccable , bonne nourriture ambiance chaleureuse à l ' accompagnie de marcelle , marie , daniel tatiana , appolinaire
text.en: the food is good but not that good. the service and the setting are average and I find the atmosphere very sad for a restaurant

text.fr: entrée et dessert super goûteux . plats de résistance pauvres peut être à cause du covid . service convivial à souhait et entreprenant . les boissons à volonté sont une amélioration délicieuse . tout le monde est ravi . je recommande . en plus mesures barrières rigoureusement respectées . christelle est un amour de disponibilité . bon dimanche passé .
text.en: a very warm welcome with small snacks during the aperitif, the rest with a very complete meal menu which makes you want to eat everything. choice of tournedos and scallops, excellent! ! ! ! the wine by the glass was perfect and at a good temperature calvados and special mention for the tea. the bill is quite expensive but given the quality of the service, nothing to complain about. the very nice decor, with large round tables (friendly) to redo

text.fr: très bon accueil hôtesses très charmantes tatiana fortune christelle très bonne bouffe . . . . a venir découvrir le buffet varie afro européen . . . poulet choux gratine boeuf au poivre . . .
text.en: awesome . . . don't miss the eclipse for dessert and the Sunday brunch. a pleasant and fast service with excellent value for money.

text.fr: un service impeccable un buffet excellent . cest toujours un plaisir d ' être chez vous hilton sutout accompagné de daniel ibrahim marie clotaire .
text.en: very welcoming and warm setting! ! a very charming owner who takes great care! ! the meal was very good, drinks were even offered! ! we will return with joy! ! ! !

text.fr: top service . marie , ibrahim et voltaire . . . . merci beaucoup . a une prochaine fois . . . . le repas et service est juste au top
text.en: excellent dishes, excellent atmosphere, very pleasant service, only downside. . . . Only 1 bottle of ruinart in the cellar! ! but we don't blame them because for our birthday party the management offered us nice desserts! No ?

text.fr: service accueil très chaleureux climat de convivialité . très beau buffet dessert aussi . et surtt satisfaite du service tata marcelle et me clotaire . merci encore le service du safoutier . !
text.en: I found myself there with friends who knew the place and highly recommended it. the setting is indeed very nice (all the furniture and accessories are imported from Indonesia), but I found the meal average, and the prices far too high. 30,000 frs per person without wine

text.fr: mon passage à ce resto fut incroyable par ces amples menus et surtout des déserts à régaler . le service est si accueillant car j ai rencontré une serveuse sur le nom de tata marcelle qui c est occupé de moins quand je voulais quelque chose , vraiment merci aussi à mr clotaire et j ai hâte de revenir .
text.en: nothing when entering the restaurant, we travel and we feel good there. the welcome is warm. we have a real moment of relaxation. it's a feast for the eyes and taste buds as soon as the plates arrive.

text.fr: service excellent . marie la meilleure et mr . ibrahim aussi . plat de résistance moins n fournit vous pouvez faire mieux .
text.en: this restaurant is a refinement for the palate, a pleasure for the eyes. a magnificent setting, an exceptional wine cellar and a menu await you there and will seduce you.

text.fr: le service est performant . c ’ est un endroit paisible paisible le serveur clotaire est disponible et n ’ hésite pas à répondre à toutes mes préoccupations
text.en: the setting is in the same sense as the cozii, offbeat and retro while being warm, me who is difficult and very critical, the food is very good, the service is very good and the owner is very friendly and warm it is a setting relaxing and a pleasure for the taste buds! ! !

text.fr: le service est excellent . c ' est un endroit original pour la détente et pour manger en famille . les serveurs sont toujours disponibles .
text.en: new restaurant, friendly and refined setting, tempting menu, however the menu and the dishes need to be worked on, but it will undoubtedly be an excellent restaurant in a short time, it still has a few adjustments. a mention for the chocolate/mint cake which is really excellent! on the other hand the prices of aperitifs are exorbitant, for example the mojito at 8. 500 f / 13 euros is excessive! ! !

text.fr: détendu , paisible pour manger , discuter , cadre détendu , convivial , et très bon service par mr clotaire .

text.en: the plus points - restaurant ideally located in the heart of Douala, Bonapriso district, rather business and expat - pleasant ethnic decoration, large bamboo, gigantic Buddha, subdued lighting - local cuisine with Asian influence. We loved the Thai prawns with coconut rice - quick service as long as you order as an aperitif! - choice of quality wine. we liked the white from South Africa. as is often the case in Cameroon, avoid low quality French wines that are too expensive for what they are - as is often the case in smoking restaurants. really spoils the meal and the bill, too bad - sponsors are all present. chivas on the brand and ruinart champagne everywhere in the room and on the servers. excessive

text.fr: accueil chaleureux de solange bon service dans l ensemble millieu chaleureux très apprécié et recommandé à tous pour moi c est le top merci pour le staff

Claire the owner is adorable and brings her restaurant to life in a thousand ways throughout the year (Christmas market, kids party, chic & shocking evening with DJ, brunch etc etc) it's one. A must when you are in Douala! ! !

Each time I had a great time. the setting is pleasant, the warm welcome, a lounge area to have an aperitif, a smiling and dynamic dining room team. As for the kitchen, everything is there: the menu is tempting, the dishes are prepared with modernity without forgetting the gourmet and refined side and every week you can find the chef's suggestions. the prices of the card can sometimes seem high but the quality/price ratio is there! it's one of the city's flagship restaurants to discover without any hesitation! bonus: possibility of ordering tailor-made cakes for your private events. . . They are very beautiful and good!

text.fr: tres bon buffet : belle entrée simple et légère avec sauce bonne organisation et serveurs accueillants et serieux . merci pour l ’ accueil et la propreté , pas de mouches . que du bonheur !
text.en: We came for lunch on a Sunday afternoon. after taking and bringing the drink orders, we were told that it was impossible to order a la carte and that there was only the possibility of having a brunch in this restaurant on Sunday lunchtime. not really what we were originally looking for, but once the drink orders were on the table, we accepted (but still, we could have been told before). already a little dampened by the prices of drinks/cocktails, more expensive than other restaurants in the city. Brunch didn't help. very, very, limited choice, some loose breads not really appetizing, for the breakfast side it is very poor it seems to me that there was just cereals, then for the "hot" part nothing very attractive, lukewarm quiches not very nicely presented, although quite good. a very basic tomato salad. chicken curry, pasta. . . honestly, nothing transcendent. but prices that are absolutely not worth what is offered. desserts which did not win us over either in presentation or taste. really, we should review either a reduction in price, or improve the choice and quality of dishes, because there, the price is really not justified. that said, pretty restaurant, very nice decoration, beautiful Zen/Buddha atmosphere, which we liked as soon as we entered. for the service, it was a buffet so obviously the waitresses were grouped together with their arms crossed watching people eat. brunch is really not recommended. see for the à la carte dishes. . .

text.fr: j ’ ai beaucoup aimé les plats camerounais et le service est hyper rapide et satisfaisant . je recommande fortement

text.en: friendly welcome the dishes are quite elaborate and tasty not too long to wait to be served the quantity and quality are there. I advise you to have a dessert which is excellent, a very good cellar with a wide choice of champagne and whiskey wines.

text.fr: le safoutier est le restaurant au style brasserie 1900 à ne pas confondre avec la partie buffet située à gauche après l ' entrée de l ' hôtel hilton . ce sont deux endroit bien distincts et la safoutier ne propose qu ' un service à table , à la carte ou au menu . le choix est très large , les plats sont variés et de qualité . un excellent restaurant à yaoundé , l ' un des meilleurs à mon goût . j ' y suis allé à de très nombreuses reprises et je n ' ai jamais été déçu . la carte change assez régulièrement . le personnel est parfait avec une mention spéciale au maitre d ' hôtel m . alfred pour l ' incomparable qualité de son professionnalisme et de son accueil .
text.en: a superb setting for this restaurant which offers refined and very tasty cuisine. you can have a drink in the small lounge or at the bar before sitting down to eat.

text.fr: plusieurs options , choix disponibles , cuisine variés , la seule chose sa prends du temps pour remplacer une assiette vide au buffet . le prix du buffet et 20500cfa et une grande bouteille perrier 6500cfa soit l ' équivalant d ' environ 30 % du montant du buffet .
text.en: The decor of this establishment is superb. a small lounge welcomes you before sitting down to the table. the dishes are original and tasty, I was treated to a tomato chutney with a fish, magnificent. what about banana with spices for dessert? congratulations, I will come back with pleasure

text.fr: bon restaurant , avec de bons poissons , et un personnel sympa . service un peu long . petit déjeuner bien aussi .
text.en: a warm and attentive welcome. dishes (fish or meat) combine the pleasure of the eyes and that of the taste buds. in short, a pleasant place where there is a certain serenity. I recommend !

text.fr: variété des plats et service très correct avec une personnel dévoué , et attentif ; la fête de la bière ouverte aux résidents de l ' hôtel acueillis sans réservation est une très bonne initiative y compris la choucroute qui accompagne cette fête ; sans la choucroute il n ' y aurait ps de fêre de la bière . merci pour cette fête conviviale .

text.fr: on peut dire qu ' il y a un beau choix . belles viandes grillées , légumes frais , beau dessert et franchement le cadre est sympa . je pense vraiment que c ' est un des restaurants les plus agréable de la ville . ca n ' est pas donné mais bon . . .

This is an address that I recommend because the dishes are well prepared and the daily specials are well selected. the team is available without being too present which allows you to always have privacy. text.fr: la nourriture est correcte , même au - dessus de la moyenne , mais cet endroit est fou cher ! ! il sert le petit déjeuner , le déjeuner et le dîner et un buffet changements peu ( ou pas du tout ) d ' un jour à l ' autre , et il faut payer les yeux de la tête pour manger ici !

text.en: one of the best restaurants in Douala to eat with friends or family. the Sunday brunch is excellent, and the atmosphere is friendly. great decor, great staff! ! ! The menu is varied, the dishes are of good quality and very well presented.

text.fr: je suis très contente d être passé au brunch ce dimanche . j ' ai été très émue de voir un si grand buffet avec avec un coin cameroun et européen . les mesures barrières respectées . le service de qualité avec des serveurs co me christelle , marcelle , calices et autres . je vous invite à y faire un tour .

What's more, a great team, always smiling, very warm welcome! I highly recommend this restaurant.

text.fr: accueil et service excellent ! un merci particulier à jean daniel et christelle pour la qualité du service . repas excellent et à très vite ! rdv le 4 ! ! !
text.en: a perfect place for a couple’s evening, birthday meetings. Excellent cuisine, very good desserts (yum), a caring owner. . . truly my favorite in Douala

text.fr: fortune tatiana victor marcel ont été très professionnels le repas excellent et dans le respect de mesures barrières
text.en: I tried everything: dinner, lunch & brunch, as a couple, with family or friends! Each time I had a great time. the setting is pleasant, the warm welcome, a lounge area to have an aperitif, a smiling and dynamic dining room team. As for the kitchen, everything is there: the menu is tempting, the dishes are prepared with modernity without forgetting the gourmet and refined side and every week you can find the chef's suggestions. the prices of the card can sometimes seem high but the quality/price ratio is there! it's one of the city's flagship restaurants to discover without any hesitation! bonus: possibility of ordering tailor-made cakes for your private events. . . They are very beautiful and good!

text.fr: repas succulent et les hostesses tres professionelles avec un acceuil chaleureux , tatiana , rosine et marie
text.en: I recommend this restaurant, the food is very good (the woks are great!), the decor is magnificent and above all the owner is super friendly

text.fr: service très impeccable , bonne nourriture ambiance chaleureuse à l ' accompagnie de marcelle , marie , daniel tatiana , appolinaire
text.en: Having been on a humanitarian trip to Cameroon for 2 months, I find that this restaurant allows us to escape just for the time of a meal around French or Asian flavors. . . . a breath of fresh air when you're homesick. The reception and the owner are available, friendly and they meet our expectations. to recommend ! ! ! !

text.fr: entrée et dessert super goûteux . plats de résistance pauvres peut être à cause du covid . service convivial à souhait et entreprenant . les boissons à volonté sont une amélioration délicieuse . tout le monde est ravi . je recommande . en plus mesures barrières rigoureusement respectées . christelle est un amour de disponibilité . bon dimanche passé .
text.en: magnificent place, superb decor, exemplary service and fantastic cuisine! I can only highly recommend this restaurant and of course with pleasure! I wish you a good stopover in this restaurant! rafael.

text.fr: très bon accueil hôtesses très charmantes tatiana fortune christelle très bonne bouffe . . . . a venir découvrir le buffet varie afro européen . . . poulet choux gratine boeuf au poivre . . .
text.en: I've been there twice already and the last time for a friend's birthday. and I don't find the food great. on the other hand the decor is just magnificent. apart from that. .

text.fr: un service impeccable un buffet excellent . cest toujours un plaisir d ' être chez vous hilton sutout accompagné de daniel ibrahim marie clotaire .
text.en: the best restaurant in Douala, by far, by the taste quality of these dishes, perfect welcome and service, all my congratulations to the chef and good luck

text.fr: top service . marie , ibrahim et voltaire . . . . merci beaucoup . a une prochaine fois . . . . le repas et service est juste au top
text.en: We came for lunch on a Sunday afternoon. after taking and bringing the drink orders, we were told that it was impossible to order a la carte and that there was only the possibility of having a brunch in this restaurant on Sunday lunchtime. not really what we were originally looking for, but once the drink orders were on the table, we accepted (but still, we could have been told before). already a little dampened by the prices of drinks/cocktails, more expensive than other restaurants in the city. Brunch didn't help. very, very, limited choice, some loose breads not really appetizing, for the breakfast side it is very poor it seems to me that there was just cereals, then for the "hot" part nothing very attractive, lukewarm quiches not very nicely presented, although quite good. a very basic tomato salad. chicken curry, pasta. . . honestly, nothing transcendent. but prices that are absolutely not worth what is offered. desserts which did not win us over either in presentation or taste. really, we should review either a reduction in price, or improve the choice and quality of dishes, because there, the price is really not justified. that said, pretty restaurant, very nice decoration, beautiful Zen/Buddha atmosphere, which we liked as soon as we entered. for the service, it was a buffet so obviously the waitresses were grouped together with their arms crossed watching people eat. brunch is really not recommended. see for the à la carte dishes. . .

text.fr: service accueil très chaleureux climat de convivialité . très beau buffet dessert aussi . et surtt satisfaite du service tata marcelle et me clotaire . merci encore le service du safoutier . !

We loved the Thai prawns with coconut rice - quick service as long as you order as an aperitif! - choice of quality wine. we liked the white from South Africa. as is often the case in Cameroon, avoid low quality French wines that are too expensive for what they are - as is often the case in smoking restaurants. really spoils the meal and the bill, too bad - sponsors are all present. chivas on the brand and ruinart champagne everywhere in the room and on the servers. excessive
