text.en: very pleasant service, ideal setting for a business lunch, with friends or family, impeccable service, and the cuisine is delicious. to do and repeat for small and big appetites!

text.fr: extrêmement cher , le restaurant ne dispose pas de la moitié des plats mentionnés sur la carte , et il faut compter plus d ' une heure pour se voir servir une salade . . . a moins bien évidemment d ' être un ministre , auquel cas , il semblerait qu ' il y ait une priority lane . . . lamentable et aux antipodes d ' un service digne d ' un hilton ! a éviter sauf si vous avez une journée à perdre pour un déjeuner .
text.en: guest, I ate well there, in a pleasant setting, and not very far from the city center. enough choice, although vegetarian dishes are limited.

text.fr: dans un cadre apaisant et avec le léger écoulement des jets d ' eau de sa piscine , j ' ai pu manger avec plaisir vos plats soigneusement cuisinés , au rythme de l ' orchestre musicale palliant modernité à africanité . j ' y reviendrai avec plaisir avec de nouveaux amis . allez y de l ' avant o vive
text.en: restaurant open for 2 years. discovered in July 2018. location near city center. lush natural environment. Green . pleasant . nice amenities. excellent service, smiling, professional, organized. attentive owner. Generous cocktails and at a fair price, as little known in my various encounters throughout West and Central Africa. mixed cuisine but essentially perfect European: delicious dishes and we are spared the "it's over", "we're not here". price of dishes acceptable average. A little expensive starters: we avoid it: too bad. desserts also a little expensive. no excessive waiting. overall we come away satisfied, not angry, comforted. only the guards, who we do not know if they work for the restaurant or the building next door, are tiring because they give the feeling of haggling for the otherwise limited parking spaces, at least in front of the restaurant. we have the impression of finding ourselves in Abidjan where all these security agents dressed in yellow are more there to peck the parking lot than in the guarding itself. another criticism but a trivial one: when in the kitchen we start typing. but frankly, excellence to consolidate, secure, develop.

text.fr: beau restaurant , service à la carte rapide , serveurs accueillants et très bon repas . un pur délice les grillades
text.en: one of the best restaurants in yaoundé if it's the best. a garden and redone decoration. well done

text.fr: nous avons été servi par vanessa , une bartender aux talents en mixologie digne des plus grands bar réputé . si vous voulez un cocktail qui vous surprendra , dites lui les traits de votre personnalité , et elle composera pour vous une formule d ' excellence dont elle détient les secret . bonne dégustation .
text.en: very pleasant and discreet restaurant on the terrace in the heart of a tropical garden in the city center in the hippodrome district.

text.fr: tout simplement magnifique . entre douce musique , repas délicieux , convivialité et accueil très chaleureux ; ce fût un merveilleux moment . un merci particulier à émile et aux deux filles stagiaires pour leur proximité .
text.en: the room and the garden are very pleasant but the kitchen is not up to par. We were all disappointed with the dishes we ordered. efficient service but that's not all. . . .

text.fr: diner hier soir avec l ' equipe hp , cadre agréable , équipe serviable , nourriture excellente . merci a l ' équipe o ' vive et aux chefs .
text.en: restaurant in a magnificent setting, in a pretty garden with a very beautiful boukarou where you can have a drink or even eat. cozy atmosphere. the map is diverse. the staff is pleasant.

text.fr: accueil très chaleureux , service de rois et repas juste délicieux . nous y avons dîné , c ' était un moment inoubliable tant dans les saveurs , que l ' ambiance . c ' est un espace très recommandable pour y passer un bon samedi soir cool au bord de la piscine . vraiment chapeau à maître blasius et monsieur marc pour toutes leurs petites attentions . l ' orchestre ohlala . . . juste wow bravooo
text.en: the dishes are good and well cooked, I recommend the grills, the setting is very pleasant and the service is good and attentive.

text.fr: le personnel très accueillant et disponible des repas succulents et de divers menus le cadre très beau . très bien décoré et très propre une vue des plus belles vraiment rien à redire ce fût très chaleureux
text.en: restaurant in the hippodrome district in a quiet, bucolic location. the meal is very varied, mainly around Cameroonian specialties. excellent quality of the dishes offered, ndolé or prawns. on the other hand, despite the low number of customers, it took more than an hour from order to service. certainly, the site is magnificent but. . . .

text.fr: un agréable moment sous les précieux conseils culinaires de chief blasius et la délicieuse compagnie de alphonse
text.en: I had already written a positive review on this restaurant and I repeat! after several visits we remain under the spell of this calm and bucolic place. the welcome is smiling and friendly, the service is pleasant and efficient without being burdensome: well done, you have found the right balance! the menu is varied and the cuisine is of good quality. last night we also had very pleasant and discreet entertainment: the singers (very good) accompanied our evening without disturbing it. Congratulations to the whole team !

text.fr: je ne savais pas qu il existait encore de tel mets sur terre jusqu a ce que je me rende au restaurant o vive où j ai dégusté pareil repas . je n en revenais pas de la qualité impeccable du service offert par des serveurs et servantes qualifiés qui se sont occupés de moi avec tellement de politesse . si j ai bonne mémoire c est alphonse qui m a servi et je n oublierai jamais o vive . merci o vive ! ! !

text.fr: j ' y suis allee me detendre avec mon cheri nous avons eu une place au bord de la piscisne . très bel espace avec un accueil assez chaleureux de l ' ensemble du personnel . service de qualité avec une serveuse ( danielle ) vraiment à la disposition du client . j ' y reviendrai certainement pour déguster vos multiples viandes .

text.fr: c ' est avec beaucoup de plaisir que je félicite l ' accueil et la qualité de service du staff du restaurant o vive . cette deuxième expérience , au marché poissons , n ' a fait que confirmer l ' excellente impression de la première . mention spéciale au maître d ’ hôtel patriciane et à son equipe . j ' y reviendrait avec plaisir . . . le marché des viandes me tente assez : )

Green . pleasant . nice amenities. excellent service, smiling, professional, organized. attentive owner. Generous cocktails and at a fair price, as little known in my various encounters throughout West and Central Africa. mixed cuisine but essentially perfect European: delicious dishes and we are spared the "it's over", "we're not here". price of dishes acceptable average. text.en: so here we are at the grill at patricia and arnaud. here the regulars feel like family. The welcome is provided by charming hostesses who offer a menu that meets all tastes. every lunchtime a different daily menu is prepared by a well-trained brigade. the products are fresh and the plates well presented. As a starter, the duo of stuffed crab and smoked captain is killer but there are many other things. I also recommend the tartiflette or the braised fish. on the weekend it is possible to enjoy a very good sauerkraut or an excellent couscous. for wines, no problem, Arnaud has a cellar right in front of the restaurant. . At the end of the meal, if you don't know Frapin, try it, it's an extraordinary cognac. One last piece of advice for Irish coffee lovers, ask the head bartender, Mr. Raymond, an expert on the subject. In short, very good value for money and a table not to be missed.

text.fr: vous trouverez des spécialités africaines et un buffet très varié tout est bien présenté et tout est frais et savoureux je m ’ y régale à chaque séjour . le personnel est à votre écoute souriant et jovial
text.en: Every time I stay in Douala, I can't help but stop by the grill for lunch. Few restaurants in Douala offer dishes as good and as well presented. this time the ndolé and ndomba made us fall in love. . . Congratulations to the owner who runs this restaurant. I can only advise you to go there. the first time, take the daily menu, you will not be disappointed. . .

I enjoyed the crocodile! ! surprised and always eager to discover new dishes, I immediately wanted to taste this: excellent! ! a real treat. restaurant not to be missed in Bonapriso.

text.fr: ô village est un espace conviviale , la nourriture y est bonne et bien faite , la qualité du service est d ' une dimension avec des hôtesses disponible et a l ' écoute . j ' ai assez apprécié l ' orchestre du medjang qui jouais avec assez de tact et de classe .
text.en: This restaurant is run by a Franco-Cameroonian couple. the cuisine is remarkable, tasty and refined. the staff is welcoming and attentive to customer needs. in addition to a wide choice of dishes, you can taste excellent foreign beers. a must, for me, in Douala. don't hesitate to ask the boss, Arnaud, for advice.

text.fr: j ' ai vraiment apprécié la qualité de la nourriture et surtout du service . comparable au standard des hotels de renoms en europe . en effet , je n ' ai ressenti aucune différence . je vous encourage à y faire un tour !

text.fr: mention spécial à votre restaurant , ce n ' était pas la première fois que je la fréquente , et grand a été mon plaisir d ' y revenir . depuis ma première visite j ' ai beaucoup apprécié le cadre , et surtout comment vous préparer votre buffet . ces mets ont toujours ravis mon palais . un seul mot : continuez de bien faire ce que vous faites . bonne journée .
text.en: it is probably one of the best, if not the best, restaurants in Douala. We have been to this hotel several times and have always been very satisfied. always, the front and back of the house are clean. the staff is well dressed and courteous, even if you only order something small. There is never any pressure to feel rushed. The fish soup is always one of my favorites, but the fish carpaccio is worth the detour. the rest of the menu is varied and each plate is well presented. I ate pizza two or three times and, as far as I'm concerned, it rivals the Sorento (a few meters away although the Sorento has a wood oven. The members of our group took the different dishes of spaghetti and to be perfectly prepared (al dente) and the accompanying sauces to be well matched. the wine list is perhaps a little modest, but this is Douala and not Paris, London, New york or ottawa. if there is a shortfall, it is because the red wine presented in half bottles seems to come from a refrigerator and the background music (which must most often be refused) is music from a music video. does not befit this class of restaurant. the menus could also be improved. they do not do justice to this beautiful resaurant

text.fr: accueil impeccable et personnalisé , grand choix de plats et les entrées sont excellentes , le poisson est frais et les hôtesses sont vraiment souriantes . merci pour cette magnifique soirée o vive ! ! !
text.en: This property is a real find. To enter the restaurant proper, you have to go down an interesting hallway and enter the restaurant proper. First there is a bar, then after walking through a very interesting wine rack you enter the main dining room. the restaurant is impeccable. everything on the tables is correctly placed and the tablecloths are immaculate. The menu is varied and the prices are quite reasonable. my colleague and I started with the fish soup. the same was presented in the most interesting way and what proportion was perhaps a bit small , nevertheless , the quality and taste was excellent . four is the main course my colleague had a calzone which was definitely enough for two people. my colleague describes the same thing as excellent. I asked for a pizza and it was prepared exactly as I asked. Like the calzone, the portion was more than generous. Twice during our meal we were asked if everything was satisfactory and if we needed anything else. If the rest of the menu items are as good as the ones my colleague and I chose this property to be, these should rank much higher on the list than its current numerical ranking. Is this restaurant highly recommended and when I came back there at the drop of a hat --- of course

text.fr: les repas étaient un plaisir pour le palais . l ' ambiance générale était très agréable notamment grâce au piano bar ouvert aux clients . j ' ai adoré . aucune attente entre les plats . calice était vraiment très attentionnée . elle est la preuve que toute l ' équipe que dirige . . . est vraiment fantastique .
text.en: I should probably check this place out on a weekend, where I noticed two cars and crowds outside. but, on the day (Tuesday), I went to this place for a dinner with my family which turned out to be a dull and less pleasant ambiance. Otherwise, the food is good, with African to European varieties and they have a good variety of grill and fish items is definitely a place to go. the restaurant includes 1) bar 2) dinning 3) projection screens for the matches right next to the goodies shop in Bonapriso.

text.fr: menu très varié , un amateur des fruits de mer y trouverai vraiment son compte , et le personnel est accueillant et disponible . je suis très satisfaite .
text.en: I stayed at this hotel while driving to Douala and stopped for lunch. The restaurant is not far from the main road of TGI city. it's very good, the food, both international and some local specialties, nicely presented. Transmissible gastroenteritis the staff looked after us was very friendly , helpful and friendly , esp . the price is a little above average, varies, but I found it value for money.

text.fr: alors honnêtement le repas est parfait , les plats sont consistants et de qualité , les boissons sont fraîches surtout pour les jus naturels , leurs desserts sont juste tropppp bon , et l ambiance chaleureuse romantique et même conviviale . les musiciens sont au top . et les serveurs très agréable ça change . . . . en tout cas on y a passé une superbe soirée . c est vraiment un restaurant à visiter
text.en: I had an excellent stay with my work colleagues, the food was excellent, steaks prepared to perfection and the lamb chops were exquisite. the staff is very busy and extremely friendly. It was a wonderful dining room.

text.fr: super super , il faut le vivre pour comprendre tout le bonheur qui est offert quand vous passez un moment convivial au hilton et particulièrement au restaurant o vive . equipe dévouée , un personnel professionnel et très attentif à la clientèle .
text.en: We went with a friend while here on business and I was pleasantly surprised by the food served. it was quiet at night because it was a public holiday, very good service. I chose a fillet steak and it was perfectly cooked as requested, and the pepper sauce and it was too spicy some but it had a lot of character. my friend had carbonara. He told me it was very good, although the portions were almost as big. a good hotel and will try to return to taste more of the menu.

text.fr: j ' y étais avec ma famille et l ' accueil à nous réserver était juste magnifique . que du professionnalisme et du respect . un merci particulier au chef pierre , à patricianne et marc ainsi que toute son équipe qui n ' a ménagé aucun effort pour nous mettre à l ' aise . un clin d ' oeil à christelle pour les glaces . enfin un merci pour la surprise du gâteau de nouvel an et les choeurs improvisé . des bisous à tous .
text.en: The Mahima restaurant is average. medium for the curious who want to discover Indian cuisine. a clean setting, courteous staff. I appreciated the taste and flavors of the chicken tandoori, also note that some spices are missing. I can't say which ones. . . I had to think long and hard to decide to take a trip there during my lunch break, given the difficulty of parking. but I was very surprised to discover that there is a dedicated and guarded parking lot for Mahima customers. ah yes it must be said that the buffet @ 6000 CFA is average. I recommend this restaurant to people looking for flavor but for the best, the Bombay Massala remains ideal.

text.fr: trop bon nnnnn chef pierre , mme patricianne et toute son équipe infiniment merci pour cet accueil et cette convivialité . je prend à chaque fois du plaisir à y revenir . merci à tout le personnel qui est dévoué .
text.en: the reviews on tripadvisor do not correspond to reality. very ordinary setting and atmosphere. for the quality of the food the prices are expensive. the cheese naan at 2500 fcfa! !

text.fr: très bon accueil à l ' arrivée , personnel très courtois , convivial et très disponible ( particulièrement danielle et blasius ) . mon palais en a eu pour son compte entre l ' entrée ( calamars , fruits de mer , crevettes ) , calamars sautés , paella et les crevette grillées pour finir par une sole bien braisée . . . vraiment j ' ai été ravi .
text.en: it's a cool, clean and friendly place. impeccable service and above all very good cocktails and mocktails. I strongly invite you to do so.

text.fr: accueil chalareux . service impecable . les serveurs sont à votre disposition . la nourriture est excellente et représente valablement les richesses de notre pays le cameroun . il faut y aller au moins une fois dans sa vie .
text.en: great innovation on the part of Mahima, with its restaurant where you have both a warm welcome and the wonders of Indian dishes. . . . uhmmmm

text.fr: super bel acceuil nourriture delicieuse vraiment un bel endroit pour la convivialite et la detente en famille et entre amis
text.en: Pretty good food, not too expensive. very satisfactory overall. afterwards, making this restaurant the 1st in the ranking in a city of several million inhabitants says a lot about the mediocrity of the offer and especially about the absence of culinary culture in Douala.

text.fr: j ' ai passé un super moment , je vous invite à y faire un tour l ' accueil , le service , la cuisine sont excellents
text.en: visited one evening during a short stay in Douala, with two other colleagues from the city. the service was excellent and friendly, very natural and down to earth. There were some interesting dishes that I hadn't tried before on my travels. excellent value for money, I will definitely come back next time in town. note that the address has changed from the one that was still displayed on tripadvisor since our visit (November 19, 19). it is now rue vasnitex, bonapriso tel: (237) - 233 43 14 33 or 699 68 09 99. email: bonapriso @ stemahima. com. the staff said they tried to change this to no avail.

text.fr: atmosphère très agréable et relaxante après une longue journée de travaille . le personnel courtois et intentionnés . bonne variété de nourriture
text.en: delicious indian meal we were coming back from kirbi and decided to have dinner here. Everything we had was tasty.

I tried it for lunch and dinner. the cook is very careful when you want specific / readings (food article.

text.fr: je ne savais pas qu il existait encore de tel mets sur terre jusqu a ce que je me rende au restaurant o vive où j ai dégusté pareil repas . je n en revenais pas de la qualité impeccable du service offert par des serveurs et servantes qualifiés qui se sont occupés de moi avec tellement de politesse . si j ai bonne mémoire c est alphonse qui m a servi et je n oublierai jamais o vive . merci o vive ! ! !
text.en: We went there for a friend's birthday dinner, it was our very first time. the setting is sober and the service is professional. the dishes are made from local products for the most part and the result is felt in the mouth. we really have the feeling of finally having great gastronomy in yaoundé and it’s about time. not within the reach of all budgets but it is largely justified.

text.fr: ils ont tous été accueillant , gentil , et attentionné envers moi et ma soeur , et j ' ai juste aaaaadoré la cuisine c ' était muaaa merci au restaurant du hilton ne changé rien kiss

text.fr: j ' y suis allee me detendre avec mon cheri nous avons eu une place au bord de la piscisne . très bel espace avec un accueil assez chaleureux de l ' ensemble du personnel . service de qualité avec une serveuse ( danielle ) vraiment à la disposition du client . j ' y reviendrai certainement pour déguster vos multiples viandes .

It's worth the detour .

text.fr: c ' est avec beaucoup de plaisir que je félicite l ' accueil et la qualité de service du staff du restaurant o vive . cette deuxième expérience , au marché poissons , n ' a fait que confirmer l ' excellente impression de la première . mention spéciale au maître d ’ hôtel patriciane et à son equipe . j ' y reviendrait avec plaisir . . . le marché des viandes me tente assez : )

text.en: the setting is jlli, in the event of a power outage they have a generator. a magnificent well grilled fish, but overly grilled prawns. price of surplus accompaniments despite having negotiated it. Be careful, the restaurant fills up quickly. do not be late .

text.fr: alors honnêtement le repas est parfait , les plats sont consistants et de qualité , les boissons sont fraîches surtout pour les jus naturels , leurs desserts sont juste tropppp bon , et l ambiance chaleureuse romantique et même conviviale . les musiciens sont au top . et les serveurs très agréable ça change . . . . en tout cas on y a passé une superbe soirée . c est vraiment un restaurant à visiter
text.en: we had dinner at the liner, the little wind passing over the wouri brings a little freshness to the terrace at the water's edge, the fish choice is good, the cooking over the embers is fair and the service is pleasant. The only downside is the prices, which are a little high for the country, but the whole thing is worth it if you have the opportunity.

text.fr: super super , il faut le vivre pour comprendre tout le bonheur qui est offert quand vous passez un moment convivial au hilton et particulièrement au restaurant o vive . equipe dévouée , un personnel professionnel et très attentif à la clientèle .
text.en: This restaurant is especially famous for its grilled fish. we ordered sole and sea bass. the cooking was perfect. As a starter we had prawns. not very fresh. we returned the dish.

text.fr: j ' y étais avec ma famille et l ' accueil à nous réserver était juste magnifique . que du professionnalisme et du respect . un merci particulier au chef pierre , à patricianne et marc ainsi que toute son équipe qui n ' a ménagé aucun effort pour nous mettre à l ' aise . un clin d ' oeil à christelle pour les glaces . enfin un merci pour la surprise du gâteau de nouvel an et les choeurs improvisé . des bisous à tous .
text.en: a simple restaurant, on the water's edge. you choose your fish from the stall. very pleasant and friendly. a good moment . Very good value for money!

text.fr: trop bon nnnnn chef pierre , mme patricianne et toute son équipe infiniment merci pour cet accueil et cette convivialité . je prend à chaque fois du plaisir à y revenir . merci à tout le personnel qui est dévoué .
text.en: Typically Cameroonian restaurant on the banks of the Wouri, you eat freshly caught fish in the morning that you can choose directly! small negative point: flies on the terrace

text.fr: très bon accueil à l ' arrivée , personnel très courtois , convivial et très disponible ( particulièrement danielle et blasius ) . mon palais en a eu pour son compte entre l ' entrée ( calamars , fruits de mer , crevettes ) , calamars sautés , paella et les crevette grillées pour finir par une sole bien braisée . . . vraiment j ' ai été ravi .
text.en: you start by choosing your fish in the kitchen then it goes to the grill during this time you go to the terrace by the river or to the dining room if it rains. This restaurant is more of a maquis hut than a real classic restaurant but you have to discover it or the others on this river front. small handicap now the taxis can no longer go there a scandal because they have to cross the port area you need a car or motorbike taxi!

text.fr: accueil chalareux . service impecable . les serveurs sont à votre disposition . la nourriture est excellente et représente valablement les richesses de notre pays le cameroun . il faut y aller au moins une fois dans sa vie .
text.en: good grilled fresh fish in a calm and pleasant setting. the prices remain honest and the service fast enough

text.fr: super bel acceuil nourriture delicieuse vraiment un bel endroit pour la convivialite et la detente en famille et entre amis
text.en: as always, a pleasant evening on the banks of the wouri, a sole and a braised carp delighted us. you should not focus too much on kitchen hygiene, which is more of a row of braziers. the fish is chosen and the price fixed with the fishmonger (you have to discuss the price, don't forget that you are in Africa...). without regret and every time I stay there I go back. lack of light in the evening.

text.fr: j ' ai passé un super moment , je vous invite à y faire un tour l ' accueil , le service , la cuisine sont excellents
text.en: straw hut on the riverside in a very pleasant setting. the braised sea bass and sole were very well prepared. the prawns are small but very good too. easy to park.

text.fr: atmosphère très agréable et relaxante après une longue journée de travaille . le personnel courtois et intentionnés . bonne variété de nourriture
text.en: refreshing place in the city of Douala. Very pleasant place with barbecued fish. . . even if the hygiene is not impeccable, the fish are fresh and the staff are very pleasant. atypical place with feet in the sand

text.fr: très bon moment , bonne musique , bonne nourriture , personnels chaleureux au service et à l ' écoute de sa clientèle très conviviale on y reviendrai sans hésiter
text.en: after crossing the port of Douala, we are surprised to arrive in such a pleasant place: a large straw hut with a large shaded terrace overlooking the sea. we choose our fish or prawns, and we wait quietly while watching the spectacle of the ships and canoes and the birds. . . . . . the fish are delicious, very fresh and the welcome is charming, both from the mothers behind their grill and from the waitresses. I highly recommend .

text.fr: belle accueil endroit convivial , charmant et chaleureux on s ' y sent bien et très bon repas personnels disponible , belle musique en fait tous pour un moment agréable j ' aime
text.en: Certainly the hygiene is a little doubtful but we are in a hut. . . my bbq sole was very good and the white rice + tomato sauce or chili sauce, OK. yes the service is quite long. no, the waitresses don't act 'loud'. Ours were smiling and although 8 at the table, very efficient. the nice part is of course choosing the fresh fish that we are going to taste.

text.fr: je reste sans voix parce que mon palais n ' avait jamais été autant chouchouter . merci pour cet accueil digne de votre repas . un espace attrayant quoi de mieux que de se bourer le ventre en étant bercer par une superbe voix qui ne cesse de vous câliner les oreilles . mrxi o vive j ' ai eût l ' impression d ' être une reine ce soir la . bien de chose a vous .
text.en: nice setting, feet on the sand. . . very pleasant . Well, the hygiene conditions are quite basic (table barely wiped between two customers...), but if we ignore that, we eat well. we fight with flies throughout the meal (otherwise don't eat outside), but the fish is truly exquisite. price quite high I find for the place, but from a taste point of view we find ourselves there, latest invoice to date for a small braised carp and 5 prawns, a plate of fries and one of plantains (always served warm by against), as well as two fantas, the addition was 19. 500ffc (30 euros). The real big downside of this place is the service. very few smiles, little friendliness. and you have to be patient to ask for something (40 minutes for an ashtray, 40 minutes for wiping a damp cloth on the table, which we had to ask 4 times...). . Only the bill arrives quickly, although you still have to wait a good 30 minutes for the change. . don't go if you are in a hurry, plan very wide! otherwise it's still a place that I recommend, not for the smiles of the waitresses that you will never see but at least for the delicious braised fish!

text.fr: j ai juste eu envie de fêter 32 ans toujours . . . . le service impeccable , l accueil chaleureux , le cadre convivial et le repas juste délicieux . . . vive ô vive ! ! !
text.en: You have to go by taxi from the hotel because the yellow taxis do not come and your driver will be waiting for you during dinner. crossing the port is an experience but that's what travel is. hut type restaurant on the banks of the river, quite simple but good decor. you go to the counter to choose your fish (sea bass, sole, etc.) and they prepare it for you over hot coals. you have to be patient, there was almost no one there on a Wednesday evening and we waited more than an hour after making our choice. . . the service is sluggish, to get a beer you have to ask for it and our waitress had forgotten her smile, which is not the case for all the staff. In the end, the fish was delicious, cooked to perfection. There are other restaurants nearby to try. the price is very reasonable for the quality. to do again and I will also try the other restaurants nearby (last counter).

text.fr: je suis parti à la découverte de ce beau restaurant dont la terrasse située au bord de la piscine en fait un endroit idéal pour prendre un verre après quelques longueurs ou alors en soirée pour profiter des lumières de la piscine fraîchement rénovée . . . c ' est très reposant on y mange bien et les prix sont pas " très " excessifs . je le recommande vivement !
text.en: located in the port area along the river, the restaurant offers an excellent choice of fish of excellent quality and at a fair price

text.fr: personnel très agréable et très professionnel . piscine et restaurant adjacent à ne pas manquer . je vous recommande cet hotel
text.en: small restaurant/hut on the banks of the river where they serve very good fish cooked on embers. you choose your fish from different species (bass, barracuda, red carp, sea bream, sole, etc.) as well as your accompaniment and off you go for a good time. the restaurant is located within the port, yellow taxis cannot enter so you will have to take one of the private taxis.

text.fr: un cadre agréable , au calme en extérieur au bord d ' une piscine . j ' ai vraiment apprécié le service et la qualité de la nourriture . bon restaurant vraiment . . . .
text.en: beautiful area . the service is impeccable. we ate a very good braised fish. The only problem is that the street vendors are a little too present.

text.fr: très bon service , repas raffiné et très varié et une ambiance cordiale et romantique . un accueille les plus chaleureux .
text.en: the best welcome and service on the port. during the week it's not easy to get to, but on Sunday it's a real treat to enjoy a barracuda cooked over the coals. advice to book before coming to avoid waiting! ! !

text.fr: le brunch du dimanche et menu régulier sont très bien en termes de qualité de la nourriture , surtout le barbecue . le service est attentionné et mai restaurant préféré dans l ' enceinte de l ' hôtel hilton yaounde complexe .
text.en: small, unpretentious restaurant on the banks of the wouri. covered room open to all winds and small sand terrace shaded by mango trees. excellent fish cooked over charcoal, I recommend the barracuda accompanied by fried plantins. to do at lunchtime. the choice of fish is made upon arrival, do not hesitate to negotiate and offer a braised Heinecken. the wait can be long so have a few beers while waiting. I ate there every Sunday for several years without ever being sick, but nothing but fish. . . excellent fish and inexpensive.

text.fr: j ai été justement conquis par le burger mexicano . le goût était au rdv , la viande bien cuite et je l ai fini juska la dernière goûte . merci encore et à la prochaine
text.en: overcooked fish flies at will endless service and the icing on the cake a lit who hits tap on a can to the point of no longer hearing each other speak

text.fr: extrêmement cher , le restaurant ne dispose pas de la moitié des plats mentionnés sur la carte , et il faut compter plus d ' une heure pour se voir servir une salade . . . a moins bien évidemment d ' être un ministre , auquel cas , il semblerait qu ' il y ait une priority lane . . . lamentable et aux antipodes d ' un service digne d ' un hilton ! a éviter sauf si vous avez une journée à perdre pour un déjeuner .
text.en: we ate several times, at lunchtime and in the evening, simple, fresh, not expensive and not too expensive (the price of fish would tend to increase if you are white! but that's part of the game) also tried the braised chicken. . . very good, and. . Cherry on the cake . . from the 33 export to pressure! ! a lamp will be useful in the evening, for parsimonious lighting;

text.fr: dans un cadre apaisant et avec le léger écoulement des jets d ' eau de sa piscine , j ' ai pu manger avec plaisir vos plats soigneusement cuisinés , au rythme de l ' orchestre musicale palliant modernité à africanité . j ' y reviendrai avec plaisir avec de nouveaux amis . allez y de l ' avant o vive
text.en: We went for an aperitif at the end of the week and discovered a nice place to have a drink in the evening. the restaurant is located along the beach going towards the naval base, a large sign indicates the location; large parking lot with two guards when we arrived. like a large African hut, don't expect a 3*, but if you like Africa and accept its "constraints" you should like it. the restaurant is made up of a large covered area and a large terrace with plastic chairs and tables. in the evening the terrace is lit by lights of all colors. By the sea (in fact the Wouri estuary), the atmosphere is nice, but don't forget a small lamp, if by chance a power outage occurs. . . it's really useful. the service is welcoming, not too long of a wait. the restaurant is right next to the fish market, so they have fresh products, and the dish ordered was quite correct. the prices of the aperitifs are really very reasonable, as are the doses. I was really surprised at the prices. very nice with friends, the only problem may be getting there if you try to come between 6 and 7 p.m., crossing the industrial zone and the railway line can take a little time and require you to stay calm while driving.

text.fr: beau restaurant , service à la carte rapide , serveurs accueillants et très bon repas . un pur délice les grillades
text.en: Maybe it's hard to tell if it's your first time, watch out for people in the parking lot greeting you at one of the other fish restaurants that line this stretch of road, in the harbor. . . So, for businesses, you are looking for fish, you are in the right place. choose what you like from the selection, the barracuda always looks popular, take your seat inside or outside and wait for it to arrive. not being a big fan of fish, I take the monster prawns, they come in 3 and it's a lot with the rice/fries/fried plantain. Of course, you can sit outside facing the sea, make sure the tide is right, or just stare at the trash covered mudflats. . . Overall it's very good for what it is. don't forget where you are.

text.fr: nous avons été servi par vanessa , une bartender aux talents en mixologie digne des plus grands bar réputé . si vous voulez un cocktail qui vous surprendra , dites lui les traits de votre personnalité , et elle composera pour vous une formule d ' excellence dont elle détient les secret . bonne dégustation .
text.en: Overlooking a shallow bay lined with large boats, this establishment serves grilled fish and seafood. you choose a fresh fish in the kitchen, you agree on a price and, some time later, it comes to your table to grill. the fish was fresh and well prepared. I can also recommend looking at the artwork on the walls.

text.fr: tout simplement magnifique . entre douce musique , repas délicieux , convivialité et accueil très chaleureux ; ce fût un merveilleux moment . un merci particulier à émile et aux deux filles stagiaires pour leur proximité .
text.en: it's a great place for grilled fish. you choose what you want from what's available and they grill it and serve it with fries and plantains. simple but very tasty. the prawns are particularly good. Service may be slow if it is a busy night. there are tables on the beach if the weather permits.

text.fr: diner hier soir avec l ' equipe hp , cadre agréable , équipe serviable , nourriture excellente . merci a l ' équipe o ' vive et aux chefs .
text.en: we had a good time with a couple of friends. fresh meat and delicious grilled fish near the sea with a beautiful breeze and drops of shades and amazing trees. What else do you need ?

text.fr: accueil très chaleureux , service de rois et repas juste délicieux . nous y avons dîné , c ' était un moment inoubliable tant dans les saveurs , que l ' ambiance . c ' est un espace très recommandable pour y passer un bon samedi soir cool au bord de la piscine . vraiment chapeau à maître blasius et monsieur marc pour toutes leurs petites attentions . l ' orchestre ohlala . . . juste wow bravooo
text.en: eat good fish in front of the sea! ! what an undescribable pleasure! ! it's a lilbit far from the center, but you have to ask people in the car to get there

text.fr: le personnel très accueillant et disponible des repas succulents et de divers menus le cadre très beau . très bien décoré et très propre une vue des plus belles vraiment rien à redire ce fût très chaleureux
text.en: I was taken here for a business lunch and was very impressed. The seafood selection is great & depends on what was caught that day. Fish is prepared while you wait, which means you may wait a bit, but it's definitely worth it

text.fr: un agréable moment sous les précieux conseils culinaires de chief blasius et la délicieuse compagnie de alphonse
text.en: I love liner! It's a very simple place but that's why we go. don't expect anything. the fish is fantastic. It took us a while to learn how to do this, but the best way is to order your fish well in advance by calling ahead to reserve a table with the number of people, number and kind of fish, and number of 'plates of fries or plantains. I call Fleury at least 4 hours in advance and she is always right. We sit down and there is just enough time to order beer and before you know it the fish is on the table. I noticed in another comment that someone else was turned off by the cook asking for a tip. I didn't like it either. I did it the first time and that was it. I noticed we didn't ask after the staff knew us and realized we were used to it. We have never noticed a change in price over the two years we have eaten here. It was incredible that we always spent 6000 a beac per person including fish, chips and beers. we thought it was a reasonable price for really good fish. we learned that a medium bass is perfect for 2 people. we are no longer in Douala but we still think about liner. there will always be one of our favorite memories of Douala.

text.fr: comparés à certaines rumeurs c ' est pas cher comparés aux autres lieux huppés de la ville pourtant tout y est meilleur du cadre jusqu ' a la nourriture en passant par le service restaurant à recommander
text.en: the restaurant is located at the naval base, I was there with a friend and frankly the dishes are appetizing. the restaurant is right next to the wouri and the breeze is truly exceptional.

text.fr: acceuil chaleureux , belle ambiance et bon rapport qualité / prix . . . . . recommandé à tous ceux qui veulent passer un bon moment . . .

text.fr: accueil chaleureux , buffet à volonté , service libre orienté par les serveurs . la nourriture a très bon goût aux saveurs locales et d ’ ailleurs , le tout dans une ambiance musicale aux sonorités du pays . merci pour cette excellente soirée

text.en: You have to go by taxi from the hotel because the yellow taxis do not come and your driver will be waiting for you during dinner. crossing the port is an experience but that's what travel is. hut type restaurant on the banks of the river, quite simple but good decor. you go to the counter to choose your fish (sea bass, sole, etc.) and they prepare it for you over hot coals. you have to be patient, there was almost no one there on a Wednesday evening and we waited more than an hour after making our choice. . . the service is sluggish, to get a beer you have to ask for it and our waitress had forgotten her smile, which is not the case for all the staff. In the end, the fish was delicious, cooked to perfection. There are other restaurants nearby to try. the price is very reasonable for the quality. to do again and I will also try the other restaurants nearby (last counter).

text.fr: menu très varié , un amateur des fruits de mer y trouverai vraiment son compte , et le personnel est accueillant et disponible . je suis très satisfaite .
text.en: located in the port area along the river, the restaurant offers an excellent choice of fish of excellent quality and at a fair price

text.fr: alors honnêtement le repas est parfait , les plats sont consistants et de qualité , les boissons sont fraîches surtout pour les jus naturels , leurs desserts sont juste tropppp bon , et l ambiance chaleureuse romantique et même conviviale . les musiciens sont au top . et les serveurs très agréable ça change . . . . en tout cas on y a passé une superbe soirée . c est vraiment un restaurant à visiter
text.en: small restaurant/hut on the banks of the river where they serve very good fish cooked on embers. you choose your fish from different species (bass, barracuda, red carp, sea bream, sole, etc.) as well as your accompaniment and off you go for a good time. the restaurant is located within the port, yellow taxis cannot enter so you will have to take one of the private taxis.

text.fr: super super , il faut le vivre pour comprendre tout le bonheur qui est offert quand vous passez un moment convivial au hilton et particulièrement au restaurant o vive . equipe dévouée , un personnel professionnel et très attentif à la clientèle .
text.en: beautiful area . the service is impeccable. we ate a very good braised fish. The only problem is that the street vendors are a little too present.

text.fr: j ' y étais avec ma famille et l ' accueil à nous réserver était juste magnifique . que du professionnalisme et du respect . un merci particulier au chef pierre , à patricianne et marc ainsi que toute son équipe qui n ' a ménagé aucun effort pour nous mettre à l ' aise . un clin d ' oeil à christelle pour les glaces . enfin un merci pour la surprise du gâteau de nouvel an et les choeurs improvisé . des bisous à tous .
text.en: the best welcome and service on the port. during the week it's not easy to get to, but on Sunday it's a real treat to enjoy a barracuda cooked over the coals. advice to book before coming to avoid waiting! ! !

text.fr: trop bon nnnnn chef pierre , mme patricianne et toute son équipe infiniment merci pour cet accueil et cette convivialité . je prend à chaque fois du plaisir à y revenir . merci à tout le personnel qui est dévoué .
text.en: small, unpretentious restaurant on the banks of the wouri. covered room open to all winds and small sand terrace shaded by mango trees. excellent fish cooked over charcoal, I recommend the barracuda accompanied by fried plantins. to do at lunchtime. the choice of fish is made upon arrival, do not hesitate to negotiate and offer a braised Heinecken. the wait can be long so have a few beers while waiting. I ate there every Sunday for several years without ever being sick, but nothing but fish. . . excellent fish and inexpensive.

text.fr: très bon accueil à l ' arrivée , personnel très courtois , convivial et très disponible ( particulièrement danielle et blasius ) . mon palais en a eu pour son compte entre l ' entrée ( calamars , fruits de mer , crevettes ) , calamars sautés , paella et les crevette grillées pour finir par une sole bien braisée . . . vraiment j ' ai été ravi .
text.en: overcooked fish flies at will endless service and the icing on the cake a lit who hits tap on a can to the point of no longer hearing each other speak

text.fr: accueil chalareux . service impecable . les serveurs sont à votre disposition . la nourriture est excellente et représente valablement les richesses de notre pays le cameroun . il faut y aller au moins une fois dans sa vie .
text.en: we ate several times, at lunchtime and in the evening, simple, fresh, not expensive and not too expensive (the price of fish would tend to increase if you are white! but that's part of the game) also tried the braised chicken. . . very good, and. . Cherry on the cake . . from the 33 export to pressure! ! a lamp will be useful in the evening, for parsimonious lighting;

text.fr: super bel acceuil nourriture delicieuse vraiment un bel endroit pour la convivialite et la detente en famille et entre amis
text.en: We went for an aperitif at the end of the week and discovered a nice place to have a drink in the evening. the restaurant is located along the beach going towards the naval base, a large sign indicates the location; large parking lot with two guards when we arrived. like a large African hut, don't expect a 3*, but if you like Africa and accept its "constraints" you should like it. the restaurant is made up of a large covered area and a large terrace with plastic chairs and tables. in the evening the terrace is lit by lights of all colors. By the sea (in fact the Wouri estuary), the atmosphere is nice, but don't forget a small lamp, if by chance a power outage occurs. . . it's really useful. the service is welcoming, not too long of a wait. the restaurant is right next to the fish market, so they have fresh products, and the dish ordered was quite correct. the prices of the aperitifs are really very reasonable, as are the doses. I was really surprised at the prices. very nice with friends, the only problem may be getting there if you try to come between 6 and 7 p.m., crossing the industrial zone and the railway line can take a little time and require you to stay calm while driving.

text.fr: j ' ai passé un super moment , je vous invite à y faire un tour l ' accueil , le service , la cuisine sont excellents
text.en: Maybe it's hard to tell if it's your first time, watch out for people in the parking lot greeting you at one of the other fish restaurants that line this stretch of road, in the harbor. . . So, for businesses, you are looking for fish, you are in the right place. choose what you like from the selection, the barracuda always looks popular, take your seat inside or outside and wait for it to arrive. not being a big fan of fish, I take the monster prawns, they come in 3 and it's a lot with the rice/fries/fried plantain. Of course, you can sit outside facing the sea, make sure the tide is right, or just stare at the trash covered mudflats. . . Overall it's very good for what it is. don't forget where you are.

text.fr: atmosphère très agréable et relaxante après une longue journée de travaille . le personnel courtois et intentionnés . bonne variété de nourriture
text.en: Overlooking a shallow bay lined with large boats, this establishment serves grilled fish and seafood. you choose a fresh fish in the kitchen, you agree on a price and, some time later, it comes to your table to grill. the fish was fresh and well prepared. I can also recommend looking at the artwork on the walls.

text.fr: très bon moment , bonne musique , bonne nourriture , personnels chaleureux au service et à l ' écoute de sa clientèle très conviviale on y reviendrai sans hésiter
text.en: it's a great place for grilled fish. you choose what you want from what's available and they grill it and serve it with fries and plantains. simple but very tasty. the prawns are particularly good. Service may be slow if it is a busy night. There are tables on the beach if the weather permits.

text.fr: belle accueil endroit convivial , charmant et chaleureux on s ' y sent bien et très bon repas personnels disponible , belle musique en fait tous pour un moment agréable j ' aime
text.en: we had a good time with a couple of friends. fresh meat and delicious grilled fish near the sea with a beautiful breeze and drops of shades and amazing trees. What else do you need ?

text.fr: je reste sans voix parce que mon palais n ' avait jamais été autant chouchouter . merci pour cet accueil digne de votre repas . un espace attrayant quoi de mieux que de se bourer le ventre en étant bercer par une superbe voix qui ne cesse de vous câliner les oreilles . mrxi o vive j ' ai eût l ' impression d ' être une reine ce soir la . bien de chose a vous .
text.en: eat good fish in front of the sea! ! what an undescribable pleasure! ! it's a lilbit far from the center, but you have to ask people in the car to get there

text.fr: j ai juste eu envie de fêter 32 ans toujours . . . . le service impeccable , l accueil chaleureux , le cadre convivial et le repas juste délicieux . . . vive ô vive ! ! !
text.en: I was taken here for a business lunch and was very impressed. The seafood selection is great & depends on what was caught that day. Fish is prepared while you wait, which means you may wait a bit, but it's definitely worth it

text.fr: je suis parti à la découverte de ce beau restaurant dont la terrasse située au bord de la piscine en fait un endroit idéal pour prendre un verre après quelques longueurs ou alors en soirée pour profiter des lumières de la piscine fraîchement rénovée . . . c ' est très reposant on y mange bien et les prix sont pas " très " excessifs . je le recommande vivement !
text.en: I love liner! It's a very simple place but that's why we go. don't expect anything. the fish is fantastic. It took us a while to learn how to do this, but the best way is to order your fish well in advance by calling ahead to reserve a table with the number of people, number and kind of fish, and number of 'plates of fries or plantains. I call Fleury at least 4 hours in advance and she is always right. We sit down and there is just enough time to order beer and before you know it the fish is on the table. I noticed in another comment that someone else was turned off by the cook asking for a tip. I didn't like it either. I did it the first time and that was it. I noticed we didn't ask after the staff knew us and realized we were used to it. We have never noticed a change in price over the two years we have eaten here. It was incredible that we always spent 6000 a beac per person including fish, chips and beers. we thought it was a reasonable price for really good fish. we learned that a medium bass is perfect for 2 people. we are no longer in Douala but we still think about liner. there will always be one of our favorite memories of Douala.

text.fr: personnel très agréable et très professionnel . piscine et restaurant adjacent à ne pas manquer . je vous recommande cet hotel
text.en: the restaurant is located at the naval base, I was there with a friend and frankly the dishes are appetizing. the restaurant is right next to the wouri and the breeze is truly exceptional.

text.fr: un cadre agréable , au calme en extérieur au bord d ' une piscine . j ' ai vraiment apprécié le service et la qualité de la nourriture . bon restaurant vraiment . . . .
text.en: restaurant with a large indoor room and a terrace by the river. large selection of fish. we opted for a bar. you should not be in a hurry if the fish is large the fish turned out to be good the downside is the service which is not up to par

text.fr: très bon service , repas raffiné et très varié et une ambiance cordiale et romantique . un accueille les plus chaleureux .
text.en: located on the edge of the river we eat in a pleasant setting. easy parking to access it. We choose our fish or prawns and are then cleaned and gutted before being served. only downside, anti-fly spirals would be welcome to keep away all these flies which prevent you from tasting

text.fr: le brunch du dimanche et menu régulier sont très bien en termes de qualité de la nourriture , surtout le barbecue . le service est attentionné et mai restaurant préféré dans l ' enceinte de l ' hôtel hilton yaounde complexe .
text.en: superb grilled prawns of sizes never seen before tasted facing the sea. . . . for only 15 euros!

text.fr: j ai été justement conquis par le burger mexicano . le goût était au rdv , la viande bien cuite et je l ai fini juska la dernière goûte . merci encore et à la prochaine
text.en: the setting is jlli, in the event of a power outage they have a generator. a magnificent well grilled fish, but overly grilled prawns. price of surplus accompaniments despite having negotiated it. Be careful, the restaurant fills up quickly. do not be late .

text.fr: extrêmement cher , le restaurant ne dispose pas de la moitié des plats mentionnés sur la carte , et il faut compter plus d ' une heure pour se voir servir une salade . . . a moins bien évidemment d ' être un ministre , auquel cas , il semblerait qu ' il y ait une priority lane . . . lamentable et aux antipodes d ' un service digne d ' un hilton ! a éviter sauf si vous avez une journée à perdre pour un déjeuner .
text.en: we had dinner at the liner, the little wind passing over the wouri brings a little freshness to the terrace at the water's edge, the fish choice is good, the cooking over the embers is fair and the service is pleasant. The only downside is the prices, which are a little high for the country, but the whole thing is worth it if you have the opportunity.

text.fr: dans un cadre apaisant et avec le léger écoulement des jets d ' eau de sa piscine , j ' ai pu manger avec plaisir vos plats soigneusement cuisinés , au rythme de l ' orchestre musicale palliant modernité à africanité . j ' y reviendrai avec plaisir avec de nouveaux amis . allez y de l ' avant o vive
text.en: This restaurant is especially famous for its grilled fish. we ordered sole and sea bass. the cooking was perfect. As a starter we had prawns. not very fresh. we returned the dish.

text.fr: beau restaurant , service à la carte rapide , serveurs accueillants et très bon repas . un pur délice les grillades
text.en: a simple restaurant, on the water's edge. you choose your fish from the stall. very pleasant and friendly. a good moment . Very good value for money!

text.fr: nous avons été servi par vanessa , une bartender aux talents en mixologie digne des plus grands bar réputé . si vous voulez un cocktail qui vous surprendra , dites lui les traits de votre personnalité , et elle composera pour vous une formule d ' excellence dont elle détient les secret . bonne dégustation .
text.en: Typically Cameroonian restaurant on the banks of the Wouri, you eat freshly caught fish in the morning that you can choose directly! small negative point: flies on the terrace

text.fr: tout simplement magnifique . entre douce musique , repas délicieux , convivialité et accueil très chaleureux ; ce fût un merveilleux moment . un merci particulier à émile et aux deux filles stagiaires pour leur proximité .
text.en: you start by choosing your fish in the kitchen then it goes to the grill during this time you go to the terrace by the river or to the dining room if it rains. This restaurant is more of a maquis hut than a real classic restaurant but you have to discover it or the others on this river front. small handicap now the taxis can no longer go there a scandal because they have to cross the port area you need a car or motorbike taxi!

text.fr: diner hier soir avec l ' equipe hp , cadre agréable , équipe serviable , nourriture excellente . merci a l ' équipe o ' vive et aux chefs .
text.en: good grilled fresh fish in a calm and pleasant setting. the prices remain honest and the service fast enough

text.fr: accueil très chaleureux , service de rois et repas juste délicieux . nous y avons dîné , c ' était un moment inoubliable tant dans les saveurs , que l ' ambiance . c ' est un espace très recommandable pour y passer un bon samedi soir cool au bord de la piscine . vraiment chapeau à maître blasius et monsieur marc pour toutes leurs petites attentions . l ' orchestre ohlala . . . juste wow bravooo
text.en: as always, a pleasant evening on the banks of the wouri, a sole and a braised carp delighted us. you should not focus too much on kitchen hygiene, which is more of a row of braziers. the fish is chosen and the price fixed with the fishmonger (you have to discuss the price, don't forget that you are in Africa...). without regret and every time I stay there I go back. lack of light in the evening.

text.fr: le personnel très accueillant et disponible des repas succulents et de divers menus le cadre très beau . très bien décoré et très propre une vue des plus belles vraiment rien à redire ce fût très chaleureux
text.en: straw hut on the riverside in a very pleasant setting. the braised sea bass and sole were very well prepared. the prawns are small but very good too. easy to park.

text.fr: un agréable moment sous les précieux conseils culinaires de chief blasius et la délicieuse compagnie de alphonse
text.en: refreshing place in the city of Douala. Very pleasant place with barbecued fish. . . even if the hygiene is not impeccable, the fish are fresh and the staff are very pleasant. atypical place with feet in the sand

text.fr: comparés à certaines rumeurs c ' est pas cher comparés aux autres lieux huppés de la ville pourtant tout y est meilleur du cadre jusqu ' a la nourriture en passant par le service restaurant à recommander
text.en: after crossing the port of Douala, we are surprised to arrive in such a pleasant place: a large straw hut with a large shaded terrace overlooking the sea. we choose our fish or prawns, and we wait quietly while watching the spectacle of the ships and canoes and the birds. . . . . . the fish are delicious, very fresh and the welcome is charming, both from the mothers behind their grill and from the waitresses. I highly recommend .

text.fr: acceuil chaleureux , belle ambiance et bon rapport qualité / prix . . . . . recommandé à tous ceux qui veulent passer un bon moment . . .
text.en: Certainly the hygiene is a little doubtful but we are in a hut. . . my bbq sole was very good and the white rice + tomato sauce or chili sauce, OK. yes the service is quite long. no, the waitresses don't act 'loud'. Ours were smiling and although 8 at the table, very efficient. the nice part is of course choosing the fresh fish that we are going to taste.

text.fr: accueil chaleureux , buffet à volonté , service libre orienté par les serveurs . la nourriture a très bon goût aux saveurs locales et d ’ ailleurs , le tout dans une ambiance musicale aux sonorités du pays . merci pour cette excellente soirée
text.en: nice setting, feet on the sand. . . very pleasant . Well, the hygiene conditions are quite basic (table barely wiped between two customers...), but if we ignore that, we eat well. we fight with flies throughout the meal (otherwise don't eat outside), but the fish is truly exquisite. price quite high I find for the place, but from a taste point of view we find ourselves there, latest invoice to date for a small braised carp and 5 prawns, a plate of fries and one of plantains (always served warm by against), as well as two fantas, the addition was 19. 500ffc (30 euros). The real big downside of this place is the service. very few smiles, little friendliness. and you have to be patient to ask for something (40 minutes for an ashtray, 40 minutes for wiping a damp cloth on the table, which we had to ask 4 times...). . Only the bill arrives quickly, although you still have to wait a good 30 minutes for the change. . don't go if you are in a hurry, plan very wide! otherwise it's still a place that I recommend, not for the smiles of the waitresses that you will never see but at least for the delicious braised fish!

text.fr: j ' ai passé un bon moment au restaurant ô vive j ' ai beaucoup aimé le repas . mr alphonse du courage merci d ' avoir rendue ce moment très agréable avec tes sujétion dans le choix du même et ta disponibilité . si l ' occasion se présenté je reviendrai

In the end, the fish was delicious, cooked to perfection. There are other restaurants nearby to try. the price is very reasonable for the quality. to do again and I will also try the other restaurants nearby (last counter).

text.fr: je ne savais pas qu il existait encore de tel mets sur terre jusqu a ce que je me rende au restaurant o vive où j ai dégusté pareil repas . je n en revenais pas de la qualité impeccable du service offert par des serveurs et servantes qualifiés qui se sont occupés de moi avec tellement de politesse . si j ai bonne mémoire c est alphonse qui m a servi et je n oublierai jamais o vive . merci o vive ! ! !
text.en: located in the port area along the river, the restaurant offers an excellent choice of fish of excellent quality and at a fair price

text.fr: ils ont tous été accueillant , gentil , et attentionné envers moi et ma soeur , et j ' ai juste aaaaadoré la cuisine c ' était muaaa merci au restaurant du hilton ne changé rien kiss

text.fr: j ' y suis allee me detendre avec mon cheri nous avons eu une place au bord de la piscisne . très bel espace avec un accueil assez chaleureux de l ' ensemble du personnel . service de qualité avec une serveuse ( danielle ) vraiment à la disposition du client . j ' y reviendrai certainement pour déguster vos multiples viandes .
text.en: beautiful area . the service is impeccable. we ate a very good braised fish. The only problem is that the street vendors are a little too present.

text.fr: c ' est avec beaucoup de plaisir que je félicite l ' accueil et la qualité de service du staff du restaurant o vive . cette deuxième expérience , au marché poissons , n ' a fait que confirmer l ' excellente impression de la première . mention spéciale au maître d ’ hôtel patriciane et à son equipe . j ' y reviendrait avec plaisir . . . le marché des viandes me tente assez : )

Service may be slow if it is a busy night. There are tables on the beach if the weather permits.

text.en: we had a good time with a couple of friends. fresh meat and delicious grilled fish near the sea with a beautiful breeze and drops of shades and amazing trees. What else do you need ?

text.fr: accueil impeccable et personnalisé , grand choix de plats et les entrées sont excellentes , le poisson est frais et les hôtesses sont vraiment souriantes . merci pour cette magnifique soirée o vive ! ! !
text.en: eat good fish in front of the sea! ! what an undescribable pleasure! ! it's a lilbit far from the center, but you have to ask people in the car to get there

text.fr: les repas étaient un plaisir pour le palais . l ' ambiance générale était très agréable notamment grâce au piano bar ouvert aux clients . j ' ai adoré . aucune attente entre les plats . calice était vraiment très attentionnée . elle est la preuve que toute l ' équipe que dirige . . . est vraiment fantastique .
text.en: I was taken here for a business lunch and was very impressed. The seafood selection is great & depends on what was caught that day. Fish is prepared while you wait, which means you may wait a bit, but it's definitely worth it

text.fr: menu très varié , un amateur des fruits de mer y trouverai vraiment son compte , et le personnel est accueillant et disponible . je suis très satisfaite .
text.en: I love liner! It's a very simple place but that's why we go. don't expect anything. the fish is fantastic. It took us a while to learn how to do this, but the best way is to order your fish well in advance by calling ahead to reserve a table with the number of people, number and kind of fish, and number of 'plates of fries or plantains. I call Fleury at least 4 hours in advance and she is always right. We sit down and there is just enough time to order beer and before you know it the fish is on the table. I noticed in another comment that someone else was turned off by the cook asking for a tip. I didn't like it either. I did it the first time and that was it. I noticed we didn't ask after the staff knew us and realized we were used to it. We have never noticed a change in price over the two years we have eaten here. It was incredible that we always spent 6000 a beac per person including fish, chips and beers. we thought it was a reasonable price for really good fish. we learned that a medium bass is perfect for 2 people. we are no longer in Douala but we still think about liner. there will always be one of our favorite memories of Douala.

text.fr: alors honnêtement le repas est parfait , les plats sont consistants et de qualité , les boissons sont fraîches surtout pour les jus naturels , leurs desserts sont juste tropppp bon , et l ambiance chaleureuse romantique et même conviviale . les musiciens sont au top . et les serveurs très agréable ça change . . . . en tout cas on y a passé une superbe soirée . c est vraiment un restaurant à visiter
text.en: the restaurant is located at the naval base, I was there with a friend and frankly the dishes are appetizing. the restaurant is right next to the wouri and the breeze is truly exceptional.

text.fr: super super , il faut le vivre pour comprendre tout le bonheur qui est offert quand vous passez un moment convivial au hilton et particulièrement au restaurant o vive . equipe dévouée , un personnel professionnel et très attentif à la clientèle .
text.en: restaurant with a large indoor room and a terrace by the river. large selection of fish. we opted for a bar. you should not be in a hurry if the fish is large the fish turned out to be good the downside is the service which is not up to par

text.fr: j ' y étais avec ma famille et l ' accueil à nous réserver était juste magnifique . que du professionnalisme et du respect . un merci particulier au chef pierre , à patricianne et marc ainsi que toute son équipe qui n ' a ménagé aucun effort pour nous mettre à l ' aise . un clin d ' oeil à christelle pour les glaces . enfin un merci pour la surprise du gâteau de nouvel an et les choeurs improvisé . des bisous à tous .
text.en: located on the edge of the river we eat in a pleasant setting. easy parking to access it. We choose our fish or prawns and are then cleaned and gutted before being served. only downside, anti-fly spirals would be welcome to keep away all these flies which prevent you from tasting

text.fr: trop bon nnnnn chef pierre , mme patricianne et toute son équipe infiniment merci pour cet accueil et cette convivialité . je prend à chaque fois du plaisir à y revenir . merci à tout le personnel qui est dévoué .
text.en: superb grilled prawns of sizes never seen before tasted facing the sea. . . . for only 15 euros!

text.fr: très bon accueil à l ' arrivée , personnel très courtois , convivial et très disponible ( particulièrement danielle et blasius ) . mon palais en a eu pour son compte entre l ' entrée ( calamars , fruits de mer , crevettes ) , calamars sautés , paella et les crevette grillées pour finir par une sole bien braisée . . . vraiment j ' ai été ravi .
text.en: the setting is jlli, in the event of a power outage they have a generator. a magnificent well grilled fish, but overly grilled prawns. price of surplus accompaniments despite having negotiated it. Be careful, the restaurant fills up quickly. do not be late .

text.fr: accueil chalareux . service impecable . les serveurs sont à votre disposition . la nourriture est excellente et représente valablement les richesses de notre pays le cameroun . il faut y aller au moins une fois dans sa vie .
text.en: we had dinner at the liner, the little wind passing over the wouri brings a little freshness to the terrace at the water's edge, the fish choice is good, the cooking over the embers is fair and the service is pleasant. The only downside is the prices, which are a little high for the country, but the whole thing is worth it if you have the opportunity.

text.fr: super bel acceuil nourriture delicieuse vraiment un bel endroit pour la convivialite et la detente en famille et entre amis
text.en: This restaurant is especially famous for its grilled fish. we ordered sole and sea bass. the cooking was perfect. As a starter we had prawns. not very fresh. we returned the dish.

text.fr: j ' ai passé un super moment , je vous invite à y faire un tour l ' accueil , le service , la cuisine sont excellents
text.en: a simple restaurant, on the water's edge. you choose your fish from the stall. very pleasant and friendly. a good moment . Very good value for money!

text.fr: atmosphère très agréable et relaxante après une longue journée de travaille . le personnel courtois et intentionnés . bonne variété de nourriture
text.en: Typically Cameroonian restaurant on the banks of the Wouri, you eat freshly caught fish in the morning that you can choose directly! small negative point: flies on the terrace

text.fr: très bon moment , bonne musique , bonne nourriture , personnels chaleureux au service et à l ' écoute de sa clientèle très conviviale on y reviendrai sans hésiter
text.en: you start by choosing your fish in the kitchen then it goes to the grill during this time you go to the terrace by the river or to the dining room if it rains. This restaurant is more of a maquis hut than a real classic restaurant but you have to discover it or the others on this river front. small handicap now the taxis can no longer go there a scandal because they have to cross the port area you need a car or motorbike taxi!

text.fr: belle accueil endroit convivial , charmant et chaleureux on s ' y sent bien et très bon repas personnels disponible , belle musique en fait tous pour un moment agréable j ' aime
text.en: good grilled fresh fish in a calm and pleasant setting. the prices remain honest and the service fast enough

text.fr: je reste sans voix parce que mon palais n ' avait jamais été autant chouchouter . merci pour cet accueil digne de votre repas . un espace attrayant quoi de mieux que de se bourer le ventre en étant bercer par une superbe voix qui ne cesse de vous câliner les oreilles . mrxi o vive j ' ai eût l ' impression d ' être une reine ce soir la . bien de chose a vous .
text.en: as always, a pleasant evening on the banks of the wouri, a sole and a braised carp delighted us. you should not focus too much on kitchen hygiene, which is more of a row of braziers. the fish is chosen and the price fixed with the fishmonger (you have to discuss the price, don't forget that you are in Africa...). without regret and every time I stay there I go back. lack of light in the evening.

text.fr: j ai juste eu envie de fêter 32 ans toujours . . . . le service impeccable , l accueil chaleureux , le cadre convivial et le repas juste délicieux . . . vive ô vive ! ! !
text.en: straw hut on the riverside in a very pleasant setting. the braised sea bass and sole were very well prepared. the prawns are small but very good too. easy to park.

text.fr: je suis parti à la découverte de ce beau restaurant dont la terrasse située au bord de la piscine en fait un endroit idéal pour prendre un verre après quelques longueurs ou alors en soirée pour profiter des lumières de la piscine fraîchement rénovée . . . c ' est très reposant on y mange bien et les prix sont pas " très " excessifs . je le recommande vivement !
text.en: refreshing place in the city of Douala. Very pleasant place with barbecued fish. . . even if the hygiene is not impeccable, the fish are fresh and the staff are very pleasant. atypical place with feet in the sand

text.fr: personnel très agréable et très professionnel . piscine et restaurant adjacent à ne pas manquer . je vous recommande cet hotel
text.en: after crossing the port of Douala, we are surprised to arrive in such a pleasant place: a large straw hut with a large shaded terrace overlooking the sea. we choose our fish or prawns, and we wait quietly while watching the spectacle of the ships and canoes and the birds. . . . . . the fish are delicious, very fresh and the welcome is charming, both from the mothers behind their grill and from the waitresses. I highly recommend .

text.fr: un cadre agréable , au calme en extérieur au bord d ' une piscine . j ' ai vraiment apprécié le service et la qualité de la nourriture . bon restaurant vraiment . . . .
text.en: Certainly the hygiene is a little doubtful but we are in a hut. . . my bbq sole was very good and the white rice + tomato sauce or chili sauce, OK. yes the service is quite long. no, the waitresses don't act 'loud'. Ours were smiling and although 8 at the table, very efficient. the nice part is of course choosing the fresh fish that we are going to taste.

text.fr: très bon service , repas raffiné et très varié et une ambiance cordiale et romantique . un accueille les plus chaleureux .
text.en: nice setting, feet on the sand. . . very pleasant . Well, the hygiene conditions are quite basic (table barely wiped between two customers...), but if we ignore that, we eat well. we fight with flies throughout the meal (otherwise don't eat outside), but the fish is truly exquisite. price quite high I find for the place, but from a taste point of view we find ourselves there, latest invoice to date for a small braised carp and 5 prawns, a plate of fries and one of plantains (always served warm by against), as well as two fantas, the addition was 19. 500ffc (30 euros). The real big downside of this place is the service. very few smiles, little friendliness. and you have to be patient to ask for something (40 minutes for an ashtray, 40 minutes for wiping a damp cloth on the table, which we had to ask 4 times...). . Only the bill arrives quickly, although you still have to wait a good 30 minutes for the change. . don't go if you are in a hurry, plan very wide! otherwise it's still a place that I recommend, not for the smiles of the waitresses that you will never see but at least for the delicious braised fish!

text.fr: le brunch du dimanche et menu régulier sont très bien en termes de qualité de la nourriture , surtout le barbecue . le service est attentionné et mai restaurant préféré dans l ' enceinte de l ' hôtel hilton yaounde complexe .
text.en: You have to go by taxi from the hotel because the yellow taxis do not come and your driver will be waiting for you during dinner. crossing the port is an experience but that's what travel is. hut type restaurant on the banks of the river, quite simple but good decor. you go to the counter to choose your fish (sea bass, sole, etc.) and they prepare it for you over hot coals. you have to be patient, there was almost no one there on a Wednesday evening and we waited more than an hour after making our choice. . . the service is sluggish, to get a beer you have to ask for it and our waitress had forgotten her smile, which is not the case for all the staff. In the end, the fish was delicious, cooked to perfection. There are other restaurants nearby to try. the price is very reasonable for the quality. to do again and I will also try the other restaurants nearby (last counter).

text.fr: j ai été justement conquis par le burger mexicano . le goût était au rdv , la viande bien cuite et je l ai fini juska la dernière goûte . merci encore et à la prochaine
text.en: located in the port area along the river, the restaurant offers an excellent choice of fish of excellent quality and at a fair price

text.fr: extrêmement cher , le restaurant ne dispose pas de la moitié des plats mentionnés sur la carte , et il faut compter plus d ' une heure pour se voir servir une salade . . . a moins bien évidemment d ' être un ministre , auquel cas , il semblerait qu ' il y ait une priority lane . . . lamentable et aux antipodes d ' un service digne d ' un hilton ! a éviter sauf si vous avez une journée à perdre pour un déjeuner .
text.en: small restaurant/hut on the banks of the river where they serve very good fish cooked on embers. you choose your fish from different species (bass, barracuda, red carp, sea bream, sole, etc.) as well as your accompaniment and off you go for a good time. the restaurant is located within the port, yellow taxis cannot enter so you will have to take one of the private taxis.

text.fr: dans un cadre apaisant et avec le léger écoulement des jets d ' eau de sa piscine , j ' ai pu manger avec plaisir vos plats soigneusement cuisinés , au rythme de l ' orchestre musicale palliant modernité à africanité . j ' y reviendrai avec plaisir avec de nouveaux amis . allez y de l ' avant o vive
text.en: beautiful area . the service is impeccable. we ate a very good braised fish. The only problem is that the street vendors are a little too present.

text.fr: beau restaurant , service à la carte rapide , serveurs accueillants et très bon repas . un pur délice les grillades
text.en: the best welcome and service on the port. during the week it's not easy to get to, but on Sunday it's a real treat to enjoy a barracuda cooked over the coals. advice to book before coming to avoid waiting! ! !

text.fr: nous avons été servi par vanessa , une bartender aux talents en mixologie digne des plus grands bar réputé . si vous voulez un cocktail qui vous surprendra , dites lui les traits de votre personnalité , et elle composera pour vous une formule d ' excellence dont elle détient les secret . bonne dégustation .
text.en: small, unpretentious restaurant on the banks of the wouri. covered room open to all winds and small sand terrace shaded by mango trees. excellent fish cooked over charcoal, I recommend the barracuda accompanied by fried plantins. to do at lunchtime. the choice of fish is made upon arrival, do not hesitate to negotiate and offer a braised Heinecken. the wait can be long so have a few beers while waiting. I ate there every Sunday for several years without ever being sick, but nothing but fish. . . excellent fish and inexpensive.

text.fr: tout simplement magnifique . entre douce musique , repas délicieux , convivialité et accueil très chaleureux ; ce fût un merveilleux moment . un merci particulier à émile et aux deux filles stagiaires pour leur proximité .
text.en: overcooked fish flies at will endless service and the icing on the cake a lit who hits tap on a can to the point of no longer hearing each other speak

text.fr: diner hier soir avec l ' equipe hp , cadre agréable , équipe serviable , nourriture excellente . merci a l ' équipe o ' vive et aux chefs .
text.en: we ate several times, at lunchtime and in the evening, simple, fresh, not expensive and not too expensive (the price of fish would tend to increase if you are white! but that's part of the game) also tried the braised chicken. . . very good, and. . Cherry on the cake . . from the 33 export to pressure! ! a lamp will be useful in the evening, for parsimonious lighting;

text.fr: accueil très chaleureux , service de rois et repas juste délicieux . nous y avons dîné , c ' était un moment inoubliable tant dans les saveurs , que l ' ambiance . c ' est un espace très recommandable pour y passer un bon samedi soir cool au bord de la piscine . vraiment chapeau à maître blasius et monsieur marc pour toutes leurs petites attentions . l ' orchestre ohlala . . . juste wow bravooo
