text.en: on the road to the falls of the lobe an exceptional restaurant for its setting, its generous dishes and impeccable service. pa in equation with its rank in the reviews. to recommend without reservation. service a little long the first time on weekends but quick the 2nd. . . .

text.fr: enfin , après qulques deux mois de confinement , le bacchus à remis les couverts ( désinfectés ) pour le plus grand plaisir de nos papilles . . . et c ' est toujours aussi délicieux . .
text.en: a wide choice of dishes, from seafood to pizzas, including grills of all kinds. the wait can be a little long but the staff is helpful and smiling, which is not always the case in the area. a good address in Kribi!

text.fr: après de longues semaines de fermeture a cause de ce fichu virus , mon restaurant préféré a enfin réouvert . quel plaisir de retrouver toutes l ' équipe en forme et vos délicieux plats . avec en prime une petite remise en beauté des lieux . que du bonheur .
text.en: We ate at the restaurant twice during our stay and were very satisfied with the service and the food. excellent pizza and delicious fish. We knew the lodges having stayed there 9 years ago. two great successes. well done . vs . dewael. Belgium .

text.fr: grâce au panneau récemment installé pour signaler cet établissement un peu en retrait de la route principale , j ' ai découvert un superbe restaurant où tout est fait pour se sentir bien avec l ' accueil très chaleureux du propriétaire qui est de bon conseil pour le choix des plats . en entrée ce fut un cocktail de crevettes arrivées de kribi le matin même et une salade fraîcheur de capitaine fumé . le filet mignon de porc à la zurichoise est à déguster en priorité parmi le choix de la carte . la crème brûlée aux fruits rouges finit en beauté ce repas . un bravo pour le rapport qualité / prix sans égal à yaoundé ainsi que pour le personnel attentionné et réactif . ma prochaine étape sera de venir un dimanche midi pour l ' offre barbecue
text.en: Having stayed at the cottages, we had the opportunity to try the 3 meals of the day. the staff are adorable and caring. Very ordinary breakfast, without fruit, pastries and bread without interest. . . à la carte lunch and dinner, rather good food, barracuda tartare delicious but served lukewarm, fish; sole, sea bass and prawns, tasty and well presented, espresso coffee for €2.30, the whole thing is satisfactory but the prices are high for the country.

text.fr: repas excellent , accueil du personnel parfait , rien à dire , pour le diner du nouvelle an : entrée au saumon impeccable , doux et goutue , le repas tartare de saumon fumé avec du foie gras , absolument parfait , un delice gustatif . le diner romantique , petit vin blanc pour l ' entrée nikel , bon commencement pour le repas , pour la suite , un poisson " le capitaine " très bien assaisonné et cuit . honnetement je recommande , rolland chef de l ' établissement est tout simplement chaleureux , je recommande ce restaurant .
text.en: our delegation consisted of 30 people. We didn't even have the opportunity to eat the meal because we were insulted by the owners. very poor customer service.

text.fr: alors pour aujourd ' hui nous avons eu droit à d ' excellentes pâtes carbonara . al dente , crème fraîche et émincé de poulet en plus des lardons . au top . je ne parlerai pas du cocktail crevettes de kribi en entrée qui était juste parfait . je vous recommande les fraises fraîches en dessert , pas toujours disponible donc il faut les demander . mais généralement le chef de fera un plaisir de vous les proposer .
text.en: a carefully prepared buffet for 30 people from o. . . ge Cameroon or you would have been chased away because insulted while half of the buffet was already prepaid, who can believe you? readers will have another version, the real, uncompromising truth: you were all welcomed with a broad smile like all our customers and very warmly. a superb and delicious buffet was ready. our servers noticed that you were bringing your wines and drinks in secret even though it is forbidden and have kindly informed you of this. we have a wine list at all prices available. our restaurant is respectable and everyone must respect good manners on one side or the other. the manager came to see me as the owner and I gave exceptional agreement but specifying that this is not the restaurant's policy. at the very moment when she was calmly reassuring the person responsible for ordering the buffet of this decision, a man introduced himself as the general manager of o. . . ge Douala came and started to cause a scandal by stating in summary that one does not treat a man of his rank in this way and that the client is king. . . . , he immediately issued an order to his entire team, I quote because I was present myself at this precise moment: "stop helping yourself and everyone leave immediately!" they all left without flinching in single file and this in front of an audience of personalities amazed present at the same moment at the restaurant. I personally went out while everyone was waiting outside and offered to come back, expressing my amazement at such a stupid decision on the part of a manager thus contemptuous of all the hard work of our cooks and waiters. I also indicated in passing that I had nevertheless instructed my colleagues to no longer receive O's teams. . . ge Cameroon in view of serious financial problems in the past and had only become aware of this reservation at 5 p.m. but I also thought that the bad manners of certain presumptuous executives of the company had passed, this is not the case. I invite readers to read a letter exchange with the real CEO of O. . . ge cm and the CEO of o. . . ge france in paris. the conclusion of this letter proved to be premonitory since some time later a scandal arose 1. 7 billion CFA francs broke out we reassure all our customers that as indicated by the reviews on all the sites, our teams and their managers are respectful and always very welcoming. a smear campaign was orchestrated on tripadvisor facebook and google map / business by 5 people from this group of 30, we regret it. the fact that no establishment any longer wishes to receive them in kribi is undoubtedly not without reason. here it's like a village. . . .

text.fr: un cadre calme et discret , un accueil agréable , une carte bien construite complétée par un menu du jour de qualité , une cuisson parfaite , un service rapide et aimable . tout cela pour une addition très raisonnable . le professionnalisme et l ’ expérience de roland , le patron , s ’ expriment pleinement .
text.en: the setting of the restaurant is very welcoming and contrasts with the cabins which generally serve as restaurants. the prices are correct in European comparison but remain extremely expensive compared to the usual price level in Cameroon. is aimed more at a local elite or foreign visitors. this semblance of luxury has its price. The entire map is not available at all times. the pizza is good nothing more. don't expect excellent Italian pizza!

text.fr: excellent menu du jour pour 7500 cfa entree , plat , desert service rapide et lieux très agreable , tres bon restaurant
text.en: very beautiful and good restaurant. even more pleasant since the work. large terrace overlooking the sea. varied and good quality cuisine. Very pleasant staff and customer service. I sincerely recommend it for a drink or to eat. good value for money .

text.fr: de passage à yaoundé , j ' ai découvert par hasard ce restaurant qui se veut discret , très discret mais dans un beau cadre . l ' endroit se découvre plus par du bouche à oreille mais il vaut le détour . le calme de l ' endroit , la très bonne décoration avec des style épurés , la bouffe vaut le détour , les saveurs , les mélanges hmmmm . . . on sent derrière un travail de fond très professionnel . et surprise surprise les prix sont tout à fait abordables en plus . merci au chef et aux proprios pour ces idées qui hausse l ' offre de service à yaoundé à un niveau supérieur . . . faustin mvogo
text.en: what to say ? you summarize the goal we have set: to do everything so that our customers, visitors and friends feel comfortable and have a good time with us. just thank you

text.fr: eccellente table , service très attentionné . le cadre reposant et propre comme en suisse , je recommande les yeux fermes ce très bon restaurant merci au patron .
text.en: good meal taken for the pleasure of taste. the waiter was smiling, the order did not delay at all. compared to last year, I find that the menu has been improved, and the prices are quite reasonable.

text.fr: en plus de son excellant et surprenant plat du jour pendant la semaine , le bacchus , le patron roland et son chef bbq mathieu , nous rejouissent les papilles tout les dimanche avec des grillades accompagnées de délicieux légumes . . . et pour courouner le tout le verre de vin ( le premier ) est offert . . . pour nos petits un menu spécial leur est dédié . . juate que du bon
text.en: We ordered takeaway twice. . . and each time we enjoyed ourselves! the bolognese pasta is hearty and delicious, the barracuda skewer with crunchy vegetables and rice is to die for and the chicken with curry sauce is just as good. the portions are generous, the products fresh, in short it's a great address in the area. the setting is nice to have an aperitif while waiting for our dishes to be prepared, the servers are efficient and friendly. We will return there for sure. THANKS : )

text.fr: des dimanches spécial barbecue en famille , super idée . bonne ambiance , des côtes de porc excellente . saucisse chips pour les enfants offert par la maison , que demandé de plus . super endroit . a visité sans l ' ombre d ' une hésitation .
text.en: the food is OK, the setting is quite pleasant, located in front of the sea, but several times we have had very, very bad experiences (especially on weekends) in terms of service. more than 1.5 hours of waiting for the starters, then 1 hour more for the dishes which arrive without a word of apology - we pay a little dearly to endure that!

text.fr: nulle table ne peut remplacer le partage d ' un repas simple et orné d ' une touche d ' amour et d ' amitié , recommandé par des amis . j ' ai été séduit par le cadre chaleureux accueillant avec un service professionnel et respecté , le restaurant suisse ( bacchus ) est un milieu satisfaisant et nourrissant en tout temps . . . . goûter s ' y les raviolis faits maison un délice pour ceux qui aiment les douceurs suisse italienne . . . . .
text.en: quite simple pleasant, but I am more natural. . . . so in a restaurant surrounded by nature I feel better

text.fr: j ' ai déjeuner dans ce restaurant à midi le menu du jour à 6500 le rapport qualité prix est excellent , entree , plat et dessert les tagliatelles fraîches faite maison au pesto un vrai délice
text.en: very beautiful rooms at the gîtes de kribi we just had to cross the road to enjoy some very beautiful dishes. We can even pay by credit card for our meals and drinks at the hotel by presenting the room key. an excellent romantic weekend. sumptuous panorama. . . we'll come back

text.fr: après une dure journée de travail je m ' y suis rendu et comme toujours c était magnifique . j ' ai goutte leurs raviolis farcis a la viande de veau . c ' était une tuerie divine . je vous les recommande
text.en: We are all here so happy to read such reviews that we immediately share them among ourselves at the lodges and restaurants, it makes us very happy and comforts us to know that we are all participating in a few moments of happiness for our guests. but there is no question of letting ourselves be lulled by this pleasant satisfaction: we will continue at all costs to further improve our small hotel restaurant

text.fr: très bon restaurant personnel très bien patron très sympathique cadre agréable terrasse avec vue sur la ville
text.en: The restaurant is very well located with a pleasant terrace. the servers are friendly and efficient. I noticed good management of the crowds which is quite rare in the country. The menu is a bit of a catch-all, but everything we ate was good, including the Cameroonian dishes and the fish. Breakfast is affordable and well served.

text.fr: service impeccable , repas délicieux et copieux , super acceuil par le patron et très propre . sans aucun doute le meilleur réstaurant de yaoundé .
text.en: what satisfaction to see that the sincere efforts of all our teams are appreciated! the heavenly setting is certainly free and it is a real gift to have been able to set up this restaurant there. on the other hand, everything else is a choice to make the effort to stand out through smiles, attention, product quality, etc. in response to the catch-all menu, you are right and we have just decided to lighten it and present it in a more professional way with the addition of a future choice of 2 menus (discovery and gastronomic)

text.fr: j ' étais dans ce restaurant recommandé par des amis . j ' ai commandé des pâtes carbonara totalement incomparables , des pâtes trop cuites et des ingrédients qui n ' ont rien à voir avec ce que l ' on a jamais vu dans une carbonara aux champignons . si vous voulez mettre un plat italien , faites - le avec sa recette , sinon changez le nom
text.en: This seaside restaurant offers a nice menu that goes beyond the usual kribi braised fish. excellent avocado shrimp, as well as the barracuda curry sauce. the rest is also very good especially the very fresh seafood

text.fr: restaurant d ' excellence . serveurs disponibles , des ingrédients de qualité , des plats raffinés et varié . bref juste la meilleure table de yaoundé
text.en: Unforgettable karaoke evening with friends - tasting of high-end dishes. pizzeria available - quality wine - clean seaside - security assured

text.fr: un plaisir chaque fois renouvelé , les surprises du menu du jour à découvrir . . . un patron toujours acceuillant et une vue sympa sur un quartier de yaoundé . . . keep going
text.en: charming place on the beach where you can eat an excellent variety of French, Cameroonian and international dishes, as well as pizzas, of remarkable quality. the servers and all the rest of the staff are welcoming and attentive. unfortunately, I was not able to meet the owner to congratulate him like last time.

text.fr: des pennés à la crème aux chamignons et lardons . un vrai régal . cadre très agréable , salle . intérieure et exterieur . bravo
text.en: good quality international cuisine. service sometimes a little slow. very pleasant by the sea.

text.fr: très bon restaurant , l ' accueil est convivial , le service rapide , les repas vraiment goûteux , en quantité suffisante . le léger bémol serait le prix , un chouïa au dessus de la moyenne , mais c est bien le seul bémol a mon sens .
text.en: when we are at the table we are amazed by the magnificent view of the ocean. the restaurant is magnificent, particular attention to aesthetics and cleanliness. We enjoyed ourselves at a fair price. what's more, the staff is welcoming and friendly! !

text.fr: j ' ai mangé le soir dans ce restaurant l ' ambiance est romantique le cadre est élégant le service attentionné et la cuisine toute simplement merveilleuse , vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés , bravo au patron .
text.en: nice place but average quality and high price the outdoor terrace is charming but difficult to eat after 9:00 p.m. even on weekends too bad

text.fr: très beau établissement . accueil cordiale . excellente cuisine avec un très bon rapport qualité prix . le service est très efficace et discret .
text.en: 1st review in the “horrible” category, that appeals to us! too bad that on the same day you praise your friend Marie from the restaurant that you have been frequenting for years (see your reviews) and murder us while the vast majority of our customers (+ 90%) give us very good reviews. FYI we serve much later than 9:00 p.m. and on weekends until midnight and more! why tell such lies? our quality/price ratio is renowned for being the best - check carefully if you can find fresh products and menus like us elsewhere, even if it means sometimes having to wait a little bit because we don't have any frozen products. what's the point in giving us an "average" review but lowering us to an opinion in the "horrible" category?

text.fr: pour moi , le seul veritable restaurant de yaoundé acceuil , service , cuisine , proprete - tout est parfait la cuisine est excellente et variee avec egalement une touche asiatique je recommande les yeux fermes
text.en: very good food and very good pizza. welcoming staff and magnificent setting by the sea.

text.fr: c ' est toujours un plaisir de revenir en ce lieu . la cuisine y est excellente le cadre chaleureux comme à la maison et les propriétaires sont adorables . ne changez surtout pas j ' adore .
text.en: I went there for a meal with friends. we ate well by the sea. it was very nice. I had heard about their mojito which I was not able to try because there was no fresh mint.

text.fr: cadre idyllique , repas copieux et juste fabuleux . la salade fraîcheur au capitaine fumé , les crevettes au guacamole d ’ avocat , la côte et le filet de bœuf : fantastique et une sauce au poivre , attention elle pique , mais une vrai sauce au poivre . choix de vins intéressant et des alcools , surtout des whisky , aussi . excellent desserts très frais . bref un repas fantastique dans un cadre merveilleux et loin du bruit et de l ’ agitation de yaoundé .
text.en: Very good menu, lots of waiting, too bad we can't dine in complete anonymity. . . . the servers should be more discreet and not reveal the identity of the clients. . . .

text.fr: jy ait dinner avec mon mari la cuisine est raffinee , le cadre est superbe , le patron est tres gentil il nous a meme offert une eau de vie de poire , vou pouvez y aller les yeux fermes
text.en: welcoming staff, magnificent seaside setting and wide choice of dishes. the quality is there and it’s a pleasure!

text.fr: magnifique restaurant situation très calme et stylé , la cuisine est excellente , le service efficace et le rapport qualité prix très intéressant , je le recommande
text.en: a restaurant with a pretty maritime decoration, with fish dishes, seafood, meats, Cameroonian specialties, pizzas. . . we came for a dinner, with a table of around ten people. the restaurant was busy, we were still well served, even if the poor waiter seemed exhausted from running around. we all ate very well, the dg chicken was magnificent! but a friend regretted that her shrimp n' dolé was bitter. very reasonable price, waterfront restaurant, with access to the beach. on the other hand, we really suffered from the "concert" given by the singers, who really gave voice, but not always to our taste! ! ! :) in the morning we had already come for breakfast and had also been very well received. an address to recommend to everyone!

text.fr: nous avons mangé au bacchus plusieurs fois et jamais déçu . accueil cordial par le patron des lieux , tables en terrasse ou à l ' intérieur . cadre agréable et décoré avec goût . en terrasse vue sur la ville . service rapide et professionnel . cuisine européenne recherchée et pleine de saveur . que dire de plus ? ah oui , excellent rapport qualité prix ! merci pour l ' excellente cuisine que l ' on partage au bacchus .
text.en: for me number 2 of kribi everything is fresh, quality and well prepared. the frame is well done the wood has been well used. the boss Philippe is very pleasant. the very welcoming staff, a special mention for Marie in the kitchen.

text.fr: nous avons été super bien reçus par roland , le gérant de ce restaurant qui s ’ est montré tout le long disponible et à notre écoute cuisine très bonne et cadre chaleureux
text.en: decent food despite the slightly slow service. The menu has a lot of choice and the dishes are delicious. In addition we have a beautiful view of the sea. I would happily go back.

text.fr: un lieu agreable très tranquille ou vous savourerez une cuisine européenne . le restaurant est très propre . l accueil est chaleureux . le patron super sympa . le salon esthétique top et en plus le restaurant n est pas cher le menu du jour coûte 10€ avec entrée plat dessert
text.en: continental breakfast good without more lunches and dinners very good choice of menu very pleasant decor as well as the staff located on the road to lobé opposite the gites of kribi not to be missed

text.fr: le restaurant est très convivial on y mange très bien et pour pas cher le menu du jour avec entrée plat dessert est à 10€ . le restaurant est très propre et le patron très sympa le restaurant est très calme . un lieu à ne pas rater .
text.en: restaurant "part of" the gites of Kribi, mixed cuisine, good inexpensive cuisine in Kribi, the restaurant is a little too close to the road but the extensions of the terrace bring a new character to the whole. the cocktails are not mastered, but the food is good! in the evening a guitarist creates the atmosphere; I have been there several times, one of the best restaurants in Kribi. . .

text.fr: best restaurant in town ever ! le service est top , les plats fins et savoureux , et l ’ en propriétaire adorable et that attentionné . rien à dire !
text.en: restaurant located on the beach, magnificent view, staff present, good food and specialty of wood-fired pizzas at any time, classic price for this type of restaurant

text.fr: tres bon repas le poisson tres frais et bon service bonne adresse . un cadre reposant , situation tres calme .
text.en: It's a very good restaurant, if you go to Kribi don't miss this place, very well located you can't miss it. It’s a pure delight. I encourage you to go

text.fr: j ' y ais dîner avec mon épouse et ma fille , samedi soir , cuisine excellente , service attentionné dans un magnifique cadre . je recommande fortement
text.en: restaurant on the beach with relaxed atmosphere. friendly welcome and beautiful setting. very nice menu and excellent cuisine. recommended: fresh fish or braised meat! !

text.fr: une cuisine de qualité et un patron qui mettent papilles et hôtes à l ' aise . le menu du jour est une surprise permanente . un cadre sympa .
text.en: food good but not exceptional, the shrimp kribienne was much better at the chute de la lobe restaurant very clean, very nice place on the beach professional staff price too high

text.fr: cadre calme , cosy et reposant . accueil chaleureux et la bouffe alors . . . huuuum trop trop trop bon . n ' hésitez pas à y faire un tour vous allez revenir .
text.en: clean, chic but relaxed, excellent braised sole! Very friendly staff, idyllic setting with your feet in the water in the moonlight. . . . valid ! ! !

text.fr: accueil très chaleureux le cadre est très agréable et convivial et la nourriture est excellente produits très très frais je le recommande vivement
text.en: Quite remarkable restaurant: a lot of research in decoration, refined dishes, attentive staff. the terrace is very pleasant facing the sea. What a joy to have a restaurant of this level in Kribi where quality establishments are not legion. A favorite !

text.fr: des produits de qualité très bien cuisinés , un service très agréable et professionnel dans un très bon restaurant .
text.en: what more can I say, fast and perfect service, food of perfect quality and in sufficient quantity. a fitting addition, a splendid setting. a discreet and quality musician, excellent toilets to recommend: the tournedos with pepper sauce when you can't get enough of the succulent garlic or kribienne shrimp. ah yes a fault, the Breton boss was not there! so we will come back. .

text.fr: super restaurant , accueil fabuleux , service de qualité et le repas est . . . et le cadre est idéal pour des moments à deux .
text.en: one of the best kribi restaurants. exceptional setting. good welcome, good food, superb pizzas. fast and careful service. beautiful view of the sea, feet in the water. clean restaurant, staff available and smiling. a big thank you to January the pizza chef, to Olivier, Sandrine and the others. they will recognize . the spicy ginger shrimp we loved. the children loved the pizzas. I recommend the pleasure of taste. Don't forget to also visit the Lobé Falls and the Pygmy Camp. see you soon .

text.fr: repas exquis qualité de service parfaite cadre somptueux propre et sécurisant ponctualité rien à redire les repas devaient être prêt à 12h et à 11 tout était ok
text.en: no restaurant worthy of the name; in Kribi except probably the 2 cities, the rest does not serve as real professional cuisine. pleasure of taste is feet in the water and excellent

text.fr: magnifique restaurant . le cadre est super . mon coup de cœur depuis quelques années déjà . la cuisine y est juste parfaite et le personnel d ' un professionalisme incroyable , félicitations à monsieur auri . nous y avons célébré l ' anniversaire de nos parents le weekend dernier et tous les invités de là très satisfaits . merci beaucoup
text.en: nice restaurant, simple, service is average, pizzas are good. The restaurant is equipped with a TV so you can watch football matches. there is a terrace and in general the restaurant is spacious.

text.fr: quel plaisir de retrouver les excellents plats de ce fameux restaurant après plusieurs semaines de privation à cause du confinement covid - 19 . l ' accueil par roland est toujours aussi sympathique avec l ' impression de retrouver un ami après une longue absence . restauration et services sont toujours impeccables , un incontournable à yaoundé . maintenant nous attendons le 1er août pour la fête nationale suisse avec un repas spécial pour cet événement en soirée !
text.en: nothing to say about the dishes, everything is good in the morning, at noon, in the afternoon and in the evening. and to top it all off, a splendid view of the sea, the restaurant divided into 2 while forming a restaurant gives you the choice between being in the whole restaurant and being under the trees while facing the sea! ! ! and the name of the restaurant is perfect, it’s a real pleasure not only for the taste but also for the eyes! ! !

text.fr: figure de yaoundé depuis bientôt 2 ans , roland nous a manqué pendant presque 2 mois mois mais ça y est le restaurant est à nouveau ouvert . la nourriture toujours fraîche , goûteuse et délicieuse m enchante chaque fois . l ' endroit est joliment décoré , calme et propice à de belles rencontres . le bacchus est pour moi une vraie retraite , un moment pour moi où le brouhaha de la ville cesse pour laisser la place à des moments d ' échanges , d ' amour et de convivialité . merci roland et bravo
text.en: the menu is very varied, the dishes are copious; good service and welcoming; the restaurant is located in the immediate vicinity of the water, the terrace has been redone and enlarged

text.fr: enfin , après qulques deux mois de confinement , le bacchus à remis les couverts ( désinfectés ) pour le plus grand plaisir de nos papilles . . . et c ' est toujours aussi délicieux . .
text.en: well visited by Europeans visiting Kribi. a good address with a varied menu, impeccable service and atmosphere. the manager took a lot of trouble with the decoration. to must of you are around. . .

text.fr: après de longues semaines de fermeture a cause de ce fichu virus , mon restaurant préféré a enfin réouvert . quel plaisir de retrouver toutes l ' équipe en forme et vos délicieux plats . avec en prime une petite remise en beauté des lieux . que du bonheur .
text.en: really an excellent fork to recommend and at a reasonable price, excellent value for money, large enough not to feel cornered by a neighbor at the table, very original decor, merchant marine style which brings out the opulent and natural feel of the setting, and that say the breakfast by the beach, a real treat, on the negative side! ! ! boffff not much, I'll have to come back and look, we'll see next time

text.fr: grâce au panneau récemment installé pour signaler cet établissement un peu en retrait de la route principale , j ' ai découvert un superbe restaurant où tout est fait pour se sentir bien avec l ' accueil très chaleureux du propriétaire qui est de bon conseil pour le choix des plats . en entrée ce fut un cocktail de crevettes arrivées de kribi le matin même et une salade fraîcheur de capitaine fumé . le filet mignon de porc à la zurichoise est à déguster en priorité parmi le choix de la carte . la crème brûlée aux fruits rouges finit en beauté ce repas . un bravo pour le rapport qualité / prix sans égal à yaoundé ainsi que pour le personnel attentionné et réactif . ma prochaine étape sera de venir un dimanche midi pour l ' offre barbecue
text.en: one of the few classy restaurants between Douala and Yaoundé. very professional, good cuisine, prices depending on the choices, excellent fish and also great wood-fired pizzas

text.fr: repas excellent , accueil du personnel parfait , rien à dire , pour le diner du nouvelle an : entrée au saumon impeccable , doux et goutue , le repas tartare de saumon fumé avec du foie gras , absolument parfait , un delice gustatif . le diner romantique , petit vin blanc pour l ' entrée nikel , bon commencement pour le repas , pour la suite , un poisson " le capitaine " très bien assaisonné et cuit . honnetement je recommande , rolland chef de l ' établissement est tout simplement chaleureux , je recommande ce restaurant .
text.en: pleasant restaurant, clean and beautiful decoration (Breton style!) the cuisine is good and the service pleasant and well done. we eat by the sea. . .

text.fr: alors pour aujourd ' hui nous avons eu droit à d ' excellentes pâtes carbonara . al dente , crème fraîche et émincé de poulet en plus des lardons . au top . je ne parlerai pas du cocktail crevettes de kribi en entrée qui était juste parfait . je vous recommande les fraises fraîches en dessert , pas toujours disponible donc il faut les demander . mais généralement le chef de fera un plaisir de vous les proposer .
text.en: the opening of the pizza corner was awaited by my children. what a surprise when tasting to find tomato concentrate in the bottom of the pizza. Is this a Kribian specialty? let's talk a little about the topping of the "gigite" pizza (the one I ate) with shrimp and fresh tuna: where is the tuna? 4 or 5 small crumbs scattered with the same number of shrimp! ! ! frankly disappointed. very expensive breakfast compared to the quality and quantity: mediocre coffee, no fresh fruit juice, two small mediocre pastries and a few slices of baguette, butter and jam. a little positive with the setting and the restaurant which are very nice, staff available and friendly.

text.fr: un cadre calme et discret , un accueil agréable , une carte bien construite complétée par un menu du jour de qualité , une cuisson parfaite , un service rapide et aimable . tout cela pour une addition très raisonnable . le professionnalisme et l ’ expérience de roland , le patron , s ’ expriment pleinement .
text.en: everything is professional, nothing to say, beautiful establishment and team in the kitchen and dining room who "reassure" about the quality of the dishes with fresh, well-crafted products - a bit of a wait on Saturday but peanuts waiting for the dish! you can see the cooks at work in a clean, stainless steel kitchen and it doesn't stop

text.fr: excellent menu du jour pour 7500 cfa entree , plat , desert service rapide et lieux très agreable , tres bon restaurant
text.en: on the terrace with your feet in the water a good mixed grill! impeccable service and inventive cuisine for an excellent time. the Breton boss obviously loves the sea; decor and map to see absolutely

text.fr: de passage à yaoundé , j ' ai découvert par hasard ce restaurant qui se veut discret , très discret mais dans un beau cadre . l ' endroit se découvre plus par du bouche à oreille mais il vaut le détour . le calme de l ' endroit , la très bonne décoration avec des style épurés , la bouffe vaut le détour , les saveurs , les mélanges hmmmm . . . on sent derrière un travail de fond très professionnel . et surprise surprise les prix sont tout à fait abordables en plus . merci au chef et aux proprios pour ces idées qui hausse l ' offre de service à yaoundé à un niveau supérieur . . . faustin mvogo
text.en: big problem, half of the dishes are missing on a menu which is already not very extensive. average kitchen. avoid the beef steak, the piece is 5 cm2

text.fr: eccellente table , service très attentionné . le cadre reposant et propre comme en suisse , je recommande les yeux fermes ce très bon restaurant merci au patron .
text.en: our chef Ludo came specially from France to bring his experience after having run quality restaurants in different countries. we are adapting little by little to the particular requirements of the country, the restaurant having only been open recently. you should know that quality products are only found in Douala (except fish, for which we must still ensure perfect freshness, past experiences showing that many do not hesitate to resell already dating products without any inconvenience, not having any quality controls like in France for example) we had to make an express round trip (400 km) to get supplies due to the large number of (satisfied) customers who frequented the restaurant. succeed in offering kribi quality cooking is learned and we sincerely hope that our customers are very satisfied even if it means refusing to offer them certain local products that do not meet our criteria.

text.fr: en plus de son excellant et surprenant plat du jour pendant la semaine , le bacchus , le patron roland et son chef bbq mathieu , nous rejouissent les papilles tout les dimanche avec des grillades accompagnées de délicieux légumes . . . et pour courouner le tout le verre de vin ( le premier ) est offert . . . pour nos petits un menu spécial leur est dédié . . juate que du bon
text.en: the best restaurant San Marco and the marina places where you feel good, difficult to appreciate the other restaurants, the service and the food different every day and the tourista is often there the next day so security is required with the san marco and the marina, and the fish market

text.fr: des dimanches spécial barbecue en famille , super idée . bonne ambiance , des côtes de porc excellente . saucisse chips pour les enfants offert par la maison , que demandé de plus . super endroit . a visité sans l ' ombre d ' une hésitation .
text.en: We stayed in 2 Kribi lodges and this is their restaurant. the staff is very warm and professional. the food is very good . There are just as many Cameronian restaurants and the pizzas were prepared in a wooden oven.

text.fr: nulle table ne peut remplacer le partage d ' un repas simple et orné d ' une touche d ' amour et d ' amitié , recommandé par des amis . j ' ai été séduit par le cadre chaleureux accueillant avec un service professionnel et respecté , le restaurant suisse ( bacchus ) est un milieu satisfaisant et nourrissant en tout temps . . . . goûter s ' y les raviolis faits maison un délice pour ceux qui aiment les douceurs suisse italienne . . . . .
text.en: good day . thanks for your good review . we are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and all our team want to thank you you will be always welcome with our new menus to let you discover new tastes .

text.fr: j ' ai déjeuner dans ce restaurant à midi le menu du jour à 6500 le rapport qualité prix est excellent , entree , plat et dessert les tagliatelles fraîches faite maison au pesto un vrai délice
text.en: There was a horribly bad experience at this hotel when my boyfriend and I stayed at the Hotel Le Gîtes de Kribi for 3 days. Most of the drinks on the menu were not available during our first meeting. It was late afternoon. Later at dinner we had to spend time deciding what to eat per person we didn't want was not available. it was the same for all other meals thereafter. there is no sautéed plantain, there was no chocolate mousse, very little pepper sauce, pets no wine, beer, juice and everything in the portions Were very small and the waiter suggested I sing. also, we had to beg constantly for desert and we were served the wrong thing. music life was still very good. the meals were very good. I advise you to take a car to go to the port to grill fish. this hotel, which is really very expensive and they have very expensive bottles of wine are available. there were 4 meals here as it is right across the road from the hotel and each time it was horribly bad

text.fr: après une dure journée de travail je m ' y suis rendu et comme toujours c était magnifique . j ' ai goutte leurs raviolis farcis a la viande de veau . c ' était une tuerie divine . je vous les recommande
text.en: We had dinner at this restaurant on May 21. The pizzas are very good and the service is fast. Very good value for money . I have no doubt that we will definitely return to this restaurant the next time we go to Kribi.

text.fr: très bon restaurant personnel très bien patron très sympathique cadre agréable terrasse avec vue sur la ville
text.en: we spent a few days in the kribi lodges and breakfast and evening meals are served here. We didn't want to go anywhere else, because the beach setting was perfect and the meals were very good. Some of our group had shrimp but most of us had pizza because they are so well done in an authentic wood fired oven. Even if you are not at the hotel, you must come here for a good meal in an ideal setting.

text.fr: service impeccable , repas délicieux et copieux , super acceuil par le patron et très propre . sans aucun doute le meilleur réstaurant de yaoundé .
text.en: always a pleasure to come and eat in front of the sea in this restaurant! we were disappointed by two criteria. the first is the waiting time after ordering! ! the second is the quality of the cheese used on pizzas and in cheeseburgers. not really digestible or even good. to review !

text.fr: j ' étais dans ce restaurant recommandé par des amis . j ' ai commandé des pâtes carbonara totalement incomparables , des pâtes trop cuites et des ingrédients qui n ' ont rien à voir avec ce que l ' on a jamais vu dans une carbonara aux champignons . si vous voulez mettre un plat italien , faites - le avec sa recette , sinon changez le nom
text.en: well received the food is good but often they forget the orders, but otherwise it is good.

text.fr: restaurant d ' excellence . serveurs disponibles , des ingrédients de qualité , des plats raffinés et varié . bref juste la meilleure table de yaoundé
text.en: upon our arrival at the hotel (13 adults and 1 child) we had prepared a very large and beautiful table with a view of the sea, even at night it was magnificent. Special mention to the servers who were very, very patient. the prawns and lobsters are a real treat. and every day breakfasts always around a large table and an all-you-can-eat buffet. don't really hesitate to go there, my second stay in Kribi is perfect. Thank you for delighting our taste buds. Even in Marseille the prawns are not as good as the taste buds.

text.fr: un plaisir chaque fois renouvelé , les surprises du menu du jour à découvrir . . . un patron toujours acceuillant et une vue sympa sur un quartier de yaoundé . . . keep going
text.en: a management team that listens and responds to table service. the cuisine is still as good, the setting evolves with an enlarged terrace and of course still the ocean as a landscape. a breakfast with choice and an always smiling welcome from “madam breakfast” is a nice start to the day.

text.fr: des pennés à la crème aux chamignons et lardons . un vrai régal . cadre très agréable , salle . intérieure et exterieur . bravo
text.en: excellent service. . . Georges the waiter was smiling and efficient. the food, especially the barracuda tartare and the braised fish, are excellent. . . I highly recommend . . .

text.fr: très bon restaurant , l ' accueil est convivial , le service rapide , les repas vraiment goûteux , en quantité suffisante . le léger bémol serait le prix , un chouïa au dessus de la moyenne , mais c est bien le seul bémol a mon sens .
text.en: the service is impeccable. It's always very pleasant to eat at mother's side. the services are quite quick and very easy with the remote controls available on all tables. the menu is very varied and the prices are even high, but guests of the hotel "les gites de kribi" benefit from a 10% reduction on their bill (and the breakfast is in the form of a free buffet for our the latter) while waiting for your order to be ready, you are entitled to aperitifs, while enjoying the decor of the restaurant. (which I really appreciated, the details scattered in all the little nooks and crannies: bird dolls, bells, magnifying glass, sailor outfit...) I highly recommend this restaurant

text.fr: j ' ai mangé le soir dans ce restaurant l ' ambiance est romantique le cadre est élégant le service attentionné et la cuisine toute simplement merveilleuse , vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés , bravo au patron .
text.en: exceptional place in the seaside town of Kribi: menu, view, service, hospitality. . . everyone gathered to spend time with friends. I enjoyed it in every way and my greed took me there several times!

text.fr: très beau établissement . accueil cordiale . excellente cuisine avec un très bon rapport qualité prix . le service est très efficace et discret .
text.en: having booked your hotel too late (start of the weekend), the hotel was full. I fell back on another plan b and regretted it. . Next time I will get started well in advance because I have understood the success of coming to eat at your restaurant at the same time. what a welcome, what an atmosphere, we were immediately at ease, even my partner appreciated it and did not hesitate to reproach me for not having booked with you. the meal was delicious, I had set my sights on a good grilled fish, my partner some spring rolls. starter and squid as a main course, my brother a pizza. everything was perfect, the server was pleasant and smiling, truly the height of professionalism. we will come back and I will book well in advance! THANKS

text.fr: pour moi , le seul veritable restaurant de yaoundé acceuil , service , cuisine , proprete - tout est parfait la cuisine est excellente et variee avec egalement une touche asiatique je recommande les yeux fermes
text.en: a unique restaurant overlooking the sea, all in wood. whether for a drink, breakfast, lunch or dinner, this place is perfect! varied and delicious cuisine, this restaurant really lives up to its name! but what struck me even more was the service, you take care of yourself every day. . . thank you to the whole team, and especially to Théo, who took care of us as if we were kings and queens!

text.fr: c ' est toujours un plaisir de revenir en ce lieu . la cuisine y est excellente le cadre chaleureux comme à la maison et les propriétaires sont adorables . ne changez surtout pas j ' adore .
text.en: Good welcome, helpful and courteous waiter. excellent pirhana carpachio and good shrimp wok, a little too rich with “classic” spaghetti. reasonable addition. a good address to recommend

text.fr: cadre idyllique , repas copieux et juste fabuleux . la salade fraîcheur au capitaine fumé , les crevettes au guacamole d ’ avocat , la côte et le filet de bœuf : fantastique et une sauce au poivre , attention elle pique , mais une vrai sauce au poivre . choix de vins intéressant et des alcools , surtout des whisky , aussi . excellent desserts très frais . bref un repas fantastique dans un cadre merveilleux et loin du bruit et de l ’ agitation de yaoundé .
text.en: We ate well every evening of our stay at the Gîtes de Kribi hotel. Meals are well prepared using the right ingredients.

text.fr: jy ait dinner avec mon mari la cuisine est raffinee , le cadre est superbe , le patron est tres gentil il nous a meme offert une eau de vie de poire , vou pouvez y aller les yeux fermes
text.en: run there, it’s delicious! cuisine for all tastes and desires of discovery. . . perfect and fearless hygiene for non-tropicalized stomachs

text.fr: magnifique restaurant situation très calme et stylé , la cuisine est excellente , le service efficace et le rapport qualité prix très intéressant , je le recommande
text.en: after days of fish/shrimp caught on the beach, delivered to your home or purchased at the port, we take a Western-style restaurant break: high-level dishes, service and prices. the decor and setting is very beautiful, with its terrace overlooking the ocean. the service is stylish, you can eat and drink Western or African, but of course, the prices are up to par but remain reasonable. In short, a very good time that I recommend once during a stay in Kribi.

text.fr: nous avons mangé au bacchus plusieurs fois et jamais déçu . accueil cordial par le patron des lieux , tables en terrasse ou à l ' intérieur . cadre agréable et décoré avec goût . en terrasse vue sur la ville . service rapide et professionnel . cuisine européenne recherchée et pleine de saveur . que dire de plus ? ah oui , excellent rapport qualité prix ! merci pour l ' excellente cuisine que l ' on partage au bacchus .
text.en: the food is excellent but the service is sluggish. I had a baracuda tartara followed by grilled giant shrimp (not very hot). above average taste.

text.fr: nous avons été super bien reçus par roland , le gérant de ce restaurant qui s ’ est montré tout le long disponible et à notre écoute cuisine très bonne et cadre chaleureux
text.en: very beautiful and very good! ! ! the setting is magnificent and the fish exquisite. the service was certainly a little long but the staff were very, very helpful and friendly!

text.fr: un lieu agreable très tranquille ou vous savourerez une cuisine européenne . le restaurant est très propre . l accueil est chaleureux . le patron super sympa . le salon esthétique top et en plus le restaurant n est pas cher le menu du jour coûte 10€ avec entrée plat dessert
text.en: This is the 3rd stay in Kribi and we have never been disappointed by the meals taken to the pleasure of taste. change of menu between Christmas and February, it's nice to discover other recipes.

text.fr: le restaurant est très convivial on y mange très bien et pour pas cher le menu du jour avec entrée plat dessert est à 10€ . le restaurant est très propre et le patron très sympa le restaurant est très calme . un lieu à ne pas rater .
text.en: the restaurant staff is very pleasant and very professional! the continental breakfast is plentiful! the catering service is fast and dynamic! the dishes offered are correct. Olivier Ile Grande (Brittany, Pink Granite Coast)

text.fr: best restaurant in town ever ! le service est top , les plats fins et savoureux , et l ’ en propriétaire adorable et that attentionné . rien à dire !
text.en: a good restaurant, very well located by the sea. Very nice decoration and perfect service. . . but the prices are expensive, very expensive

text.fr: tres bon repas le poisson tres frais et bon service bonne adresse . un cadre reposant , situation tres calme .
text.en: the dishes are great, and the pizzas are a real treat! the pleasant service especially that of Gérard or Katy!

text.fr: j ' y ais dîner avec mon épouse et ma fille , samedi soir , cuisine excellente , service attentionné dans un magnifique cadre . je recommande fortement
text.en: on the road to the falls of the lobe an exceptional restaurant for its setting, its generous dishes and impeccable service. pa in equation with its rank in the reviews. to recommend without reservation. service a little long the first time on weekends but quick the 2nd. . . .

text.fr: une cuisine de qualité et un patron qui mettent papilles et hôtes à l ' aise . le menu du jour est une surprise permanente . un cadre sympa .
text.en: a wide choice of dishes, from seafood to pizzas, including grills of all kinds. the wait can be a little long but the staff is helpful and smiling, which is not always the case in the area. a good address in Kribi!

text.fr: cadre calme , cosy et reposant . accueil chaleureux et la bouffe alors . . . huuuum trop trop trop bon . n ' hésitez pas à y faire un tour vous allez revenir .
text.en: We ate at the restaurant twice during our stay and were very satisfied with the service and the food. excellent pizza and delicious fish. We knew the lodges having stayed there 9 years ago. two great successes. well done . vs . dewael. Belgium .

text.fr: accueil très chaleureux le cadre est très agréable et convivial et la nourriture est excellente produits très très frais je le recommande vivement
text.en: Having stayed at the cottages, we had the opportunity to try the 3 meals of the day. the staff are adorable and caring. Very ordinary breakfast, without fruit, pastries and bread without interest. . . à la carte lunch and dinner, rather good food, barracuda tartare delicious but served lukewarm, fish; sole, sea bass and prawns, tasty and well presented, espresso coffee for €2.30, the whole thing is satisfactory but the prices are high for the country.

text.fr: des produits de qualité très bien cuisinés , un service très agréable et professionnel dans un très bon restaurant .
text.en: our delegation consisted of 30 people. We didn't even have the opportunity to eat the meal because we were insulted by the owners. very poor customer service.

text.fr: toujours très bons carte diversifiée ( plats indiens , italiens , salades , poissons , etc . ) les plats sont copieux
text.en: a carefully prepared buffet for 30 people from o. . . ge Cameroon or you would have been chased away because insulted while half of the buffet was already prepaid, who can believe you? readers will have another version, the real, uncompromising truth: you were all welcomed with a broad smile like all our customers and very warmly. a superb and delicious buffet was ready. our servers noticed that you were bringing your wines and drinks in secret even though it is forbidden and have kindly informed you of this. we have a wine list at all prices available. our restaurant is respectable and everyone must respect good manners on one side or the other. the manager came to see me as the owner and I gave exceptional agreement but specifying that this is not the restaurant's policy. at the very moment when she was calmly reassuring the person responsible for ordering the buffet of this decision, a man introduced himself as the general manager of o. . . ge Douala came and started to cause a scandal by stating in summary that one does not treat a man of his rank in this way and that the client is king. . . . , he immediately issued an order to his entire team, I quote because I was present myself at that precise moment: "stop helping yourself and everyone leave immediately!" they all left without flinching in single file and this in front of an audience of personalities amazed present at the same moment at the restaurant. I personally went out while everyone was waiting outside and offered to come back, expressing my amazement at such a stupid decision on the part of a manager thus contemptuous of all the hard work of our cooks and waiters. I also indicated in passing that I had nevertheless instructed my colleagues to no longer receive O's teams. . . ge Cameroon in view of serious financial problems in the past and had only become aware of this reservation at 5 p.m. but I also thought that the bad manners of certain presumptuous executives of the company had passed, this is not the case. I invite readers to read a letter exchange with the real CEO of O. . . ge cm and the CEO of o. . . ge france in paris. the conclusion of this letter proved to be premonitory since some time later a scandal arose 1. 7 billion CFA francs broke out we reassure all our customers that as indicated by the reviews on all the sites, our teams and their managers are respectful and always very welcoming. a smear campaign was orchestrated on tripadvisor facebook and google map / business by 5 people from this group of 30, we regret it. the fact that no establishment any longer wishes to receive them in kribi is undoubtedly not without reason. here it's like a village. . . .

text.fr: le convive y est bien reçu . le service de qualité . les entrées et les desserts sont satisfaisants . mais le plat principal ne m ' emballe toujours pas . j ' y retourne néanmoins pour le sourire surtout .
text.en: the setting of the restaurant is very welcoming and contrasts with the cabins which generally serve as restaurants. the prices are correct in European comparison but remain extremely expensive compared to the usual price level in Cameroon. is aimed more at a local elite or foreign visitors. this semblance of luxury has its price. The entire map is not available at all times. the pizza is good nothing more. don't expect excellent Italian pizza!

text.fr: 1 - gérant peu diplomate . 2 - ils vous facturent l ’ accompagnement du plat sans que cela figure sur le menu . nb . la serveuse vous demande vous prenez quoi comme accompagnement du plat comme si cela va automatiquement avec . sauf qu ’ a la fin vous trouvez un plus sur la facture . pas du tout sérieux . pour le reste la nourriture est limite correcte .
text.en: very beautiful and good restaurant. even more pleasant since the work. large terrace overlooking the sea. varied and good quality cuisine. Very pleasant staff and customer service. I sincerely recommend it for a drink or to eat. good value for money .

text.fr: evidemment cela ne reflète que mon ressentit . pour être resté à douala 1 an voici mon restaurant préféré : très bon , rapide et carte variée . 5 fourchettes c ' est la sureté de bien manger pour des prix raisonnable avec un service agréable .
text.en: what to say ? you summarize the goal we have set: to do everything so that our customers, visitors and friends feel comfortable and have a good time with us. just thank you

text.fr: bon moment passé dans ce restaurant , l ' accueil est rapide et agréable , j ' ai pris un des plats du soir et donc je n ' ai pas entendu trop de temps . le " pad tahai aux crevettes " était excellents ambiance calme et agréable . stationnement difficile car il y avait du monde ce soir .
text.en: good meal taken for the pleasure of taste. the waiter was smiling, the order did not delay at all. compared to last year, I find that the menu has been improved, and the prices are quite reasonable.

text.fr: excellent restaurant . le repas est sur bon . les plats servis avec le sourire . vraiment un service de très bon qualité et les partions des repas sont bien proportionnelles aux bourses . . . . nous adorons ce restaurant
text.en: We ordered takeaway twice. . . and each time we enjoyed ourselves! the bolognese pasta is hearty and delicious, the barracuda skewer with crunchy vegetables and rice is to die for and the chicken with curry sauce is just as good. the portions are generous, the products fresh, in short it's a great address in the area. the setting is nice to have an aperitif while waiting for our dishes to be prepared, the servers are efficient and friendly. We will return there for sure. THANKS : )

text.fr: un très bon restaurant , la nourriture y est copieuse avec un personnel à l ' écoute et très agréable . seul bémol la zone est fumeur pas top pendant le repas , sinon je recommande vivement .
text.en: the food is OK, the setting is quite pleasant, located in front of the sea, but several times we have had very, very bad experiences (especially on weekends) in terms of service. more than 1.5 hours of waiting for the starters, then 1 hour more for the dishes which arrive without a word of apology - we pay a little dearly to endure that!

text.fr: cadre agréable et déco sympa dans un quartier calme de douala . accueil charmant et présentation des plats du jour . cuisine orientale / occidentale , savant mélange . en entrée les crevettes sel et poivre sont délicieuses , non décortiquées , croquantes mais super bien cuisinées . en plat , le filet de capitaine avec les légumes variés et le riz au cumin , parfait .
text.en: quite simple pleasant, but I am more natural. . . . so in a restaurant surrounded by nature I feel better

text.fr: diner sympa entre amis . assiette genereuse et bon vin . note correcte et personnel attentif . a recommander
text.en: very beautiful rooms at the gîtes de kribi we just had to cross the road to enjoy some very beautiful dishes. We can even pay by credit card for our meals and drinks at the hotel by presenting the room key. an excellent romantic weekend. sumptuous panorama. . . we'll come back

text.fr: copieux et bien servi qui permet de passer le midi durant le week - end . english speaking guests are welcomed too .
text.en: We are all here so happy to read such reviews that we immediately share them among ourselves at the lodges and restaurants, it makes us very happy and comforts us to know that we are all participating in a few moments of happiness for our guests. but there is no question of letting ourselves be lulled by this pleasant satisfaction: we will continue at all costs to further improve our small hotel restaurant

text.fr: une très belle découverte surtout pour la cuisine indienne , les plats sont savoureux ! également surpris par le brunch du dimanche qui est plutôt bien fourni , simple et bon
text.en: The restaurant is very well located with a pleasant terrace. the servers are friendly and efficient. I noticed good management of the crowds which is quite rare in the country. The menu is a bit of a catch-all, but everything we ate was good, including the Cameroonian dishes and the fish. Breakfast is affordable and well served.

text.fr: on vient de découvrir ce resto , quel délice ! il y en a pour tous les goûts . on s ' est régalé . bon rosé , bien frais . patronne super sympa , personnel bien formé . on y retournera avec plaisir .
text.en: what satisfaction to see that the sincere efforts of all our teams are appreciated! the heavenly setting is certainly free and it is a real gift to have been able to set up this restaurant there. on the other hand, everything else is a choice to make the effort to stand out through smiles, attention, product quality, etc. in response to the catch-all menu, you are right and we have just decided to lighten it and present it in a more professional way with the addition of a future choice of 2 menus (discovery and gastronomic)

text.fr: le service y est prévenant , agréable et rapide . tandis que la carte déborde de plats simples aux notes internationales , ma préférence va invariablement à l ' excellent soupe à l ' oignon et le chicken butter massala ! en famille , entre collègues ou pour les affaires , à chaque fois nous y avons été satisfaits et l ' ultime preuve en afrique . . . nous n ' y avons jamais été malade !
text.en: This seaside restaurant offers a nice menu that goes beyond the usual kribi braised fish. excellent avocado shrimp, as well as the barracuda curry sauce. the rest is also very good especially the very fresh seafood

text.fr: ambiance super conviviale pour un dîner . le gérant ou propriétaire est aux petits soins , super sympa , les serveuses un peu plus dégourdies et aimables que celles que nous pouvons croiser dans certains établissements . nous avions opté pour des pizzas et du vin , un pur délice pour la vraie gourmande que je suis . très très très bonne adresse , nous y retournons assurément .
text.en: Unforgettable karaoke evening with friends - tasting of high-end dishes. pizzeria available - quality wine - clean seaside - security assured

text.fr: resto très sympa . ambiance bonne . mélange de cuisine indienne et américaine . bon rapport qualité / prix .
text.en: charming place on the beach where you can eat an excellent variety of French, Cameroonian and international dishes, as well as pizzas, of remarkable quality. the servers and all the rest of the staff are welcoming and attentive. unfortunately, I was not able to meet the owner to congratulate him like last time.

text.fr: très bien mangé , c ' est la deuxième fois que nous allons dans ce petit restaurant la première fois nous avons mangé un plat indien chiken masala la sauce était bonne mais le poulet manquait beaucoup d épices très fade je parle bien du poulet et non de la sauce . . . nous avions également pris le filet de bœuf sauce poivre de penja c ' était super bon une sauce extra . la deuxième fois nous avons pris une pizza " suisse " super bonne bravo . . et hamburger maison super bon aussi bravo nous reviendrons bientôt
text.en: good quality international cuisine. service sometimes a little slow. very pleasant by the sea.

text.fr: j ' ai déjeuné aux 5 fourchettes plusieurs fois , en plus d ' une carte variée ( spécialités italiennes , asiatiques . . . ) un menu du jour est proposé avec 4 plats différents . l ' accueil est très sympa et le service efficace . je recommande !
text.en: when we are at the table we are amazed by the magnificent view of the ocean. the restaurant is magnificent, particular attention to aesthetics and cleanliness. We enjoyed ourselves at a fair price. what's more, the staff is welcoming and friendly! !

text.fr: toujours aussi bien accueillis par la patronne et son jolie accent canadien . les assiettes sont de bonnes quantités et de très bonnes qualités . le service est rapide et efficace .
text.en: nice place but average quality and high price the outdoor terrace is charming but difficult to eat after 9:00 p.m. even on weekends too bad

text.fr: un de mes restaurants préférés sur douala très bon accueil , le service est très agréable et rapide . a ne pas manquer lors de votre passage . . .
text.en: 1st review in the “horrible” category, that appeals to us! too bad that on the same day you praise your friend Marie from the restaurant that you have been frequenting for years (see your reviews) and murder us while the vast majority of our customers (+ 90%) give us very good reviews. FYI we serve much later than 9:00 p.m. and on weekends until midnight and more! why tell such lies? our quality/price ratio is renowned for being the best - check carefully if you can find fresh products and menus like us elsewhere, even if it means sometimes having to wait a little bit because we don't have any frozen products. what's the point in giving us an "average" review but lowering us to an opinion in the "horrible" category?

text.fr: bon accueil , salle agreable , une carte très variée du burger à la pizza en passant par le tandori et tout est très bon . le plus la livraison dans bonapriso
text.en: very good food and very good pizza. welcoming staff and magnificent setting by the sea.

text.fr: excellent ! ! ! le service , les assiettes , tout est bon ! le cadre est très agréable et les patrons sont très sympas . y aller absolument quand on est de passage sur douala . leurs brunchs en fin de semaine est à tomber . les 5 continents sont bien représentés donc l ' embarras du choisir y est . les assiettes sont très copieuses et le rapport qualité prix y est !
text.en: I went there for a meal with friends. we ate well by the sea. it was very nice. I had heard about their mojito which I was not able to try because there was no fresh mint.

text.fr: un de mes endroits favoris à douala . accueil convivial des gérants . un vaste choix de nourriture pour convenir à tous . rapport qualité / prix imbattable . nous y allons et y retournerons . mes enfants adorent .
text.en: Very good menu, lots of waiting, too bad we can't dine in complete anonymity. . . . the servers should be more discreet and not reveal the identity of the clients. . . .

text.fr: restaurant très convivial , la bouffe nickel chrome , petit bemol on doit être acceuillit de la même manière que l on soit expat ( blanc ) ou local . . . restaurant que je recommande fortement . .
text.en: welcoming staff, magnificent seaside setting and wide choice of dishes. the quality is there and it’s a pleasure!

text.fr: très bon en cuisine spécialisé les indienne problème les crevettes son petite et surgelés pas à mon goût
text.en: a restaurant with a pretty maritime decoration, with fish dishes, seafood, meats, Cameroonian specialties, pizzas. . . we came for a dinner, with a table of around ten people. the restaurant was busy, we were still well served, even if the poor waiter seemed exhausted from running around. we all ate very well, the dg chicken was magnificent! but a friend regretted that her shrimp n' dolé was bitter. very reasonable price, waterfront restaurant, with access to the beach. on the other hand, we really suffered from the "concert" given by the singers, who really gave voice, but not always to our taste! ! ! :) in the morning we had already come for breakfast and had also been very well received. an address to recommend to everyone!

text.fr: le restaurant propose beaucoup de spécialités différentes ( indiennes , italiennes , asiatiques , européennes ) et tout est bon . le service et l ' accueil sont chaleureux et les assiettes très copieuses . j ' y déjeune régulièrement et la qualité est toujours la même .
text.en: for me number 2 of kribi everything is fresh, quality and well prepared. the frame is well done the wood has been well used. the boss Philippe is very pleasant. the very welcoming staff, a special mention for Marie in the kitchen.

text.fr: plats trop internationalisés . manque de caractère . un cuisine indoue sans curry mais avec du soja . décevant
text.en: decent food despite the slightly slow service. The menu has a lot of choice and the dishes are delicious. In addition we have a beautiful view of the sea. I would happily go back.

text.fr: un resto très sympathique la cuisine indienne délicieuse , les pizzas super bonnes avec le choix de pâte fine ou pâte épaisse , la patronne vous accueillera avec son accent canadien et le sourire attention réservation recommandé surtout le dimanche midi car un resto rarement ouvert le dimanche midi .
text.en: continental breakfast good without more lunches and dinners very good choice of menu very pleasant decor as well as the staff located on the road to lobé opposite the gites of kribi not to be missed

text.fr: nous y sommes allés à maintes reprises : déjeuners , dîners , c ' est toujours excellent , avec des produits frais et une présentation raffinée . l ’ accueil y est toujours agréable et le personnel est à votre écoute .
text.en: restaurant "part of" the gites of Kribi, mixed cuisine, good inexpensive cuisine in Kribi, the restaurant is a little too close to the road but the extensions of the terrace bring a new character to the whole. the cocktails are not mastered, but the food is good! in the evening a guitarist creates the atmosphere; I have been there several times, one of the best restaurants in Kribi. . .

text.fr: petit , propre et bon equipe dynamique et très disponible la diversité de la carte fera plaisir aux familles aux goûts opposés pizza avec pâte americaine très recommandée livraison disponibles
text.en: restaurant located on the beach, magnificent view, staff present, good food and specialty of wood-fired pizzas at any time, classic price for this type of restaurant

text.fr: restaurant parfait pour la courtoisie comme le service et la qualité relaxant car il n y a pas le chahut des restaurants habituels et le service est rapide . nous avons l habitude de manger toujours la même chose . poulet tilkka que nous adorons . les pizzas sont délicieuses et très garnies . reproche à faire manqué de variétés dans les desserts sinon parfait avec des patrons souriants et disponibles pour le client
text.en: It's a very good restaurant, if you go to Kribi don't miss this place, very well located you can't miss it. It’s a pure delight. I encourage you to go

text.fr: de passage à douala , nous sommes allé dîner aux cinq fourchettes . une superbe expérience et d ' échange . la cuisine est excellente l ' accueil est chaleureux je recommande vivement
text.en: restaurant on the beach with relaxed atmosphere. friendly welcome and beautiful setting. very nice menu and excellent cuisine. recommended: fresh fish or braised meat! !

text.fr: une carte variée , des plats du monde ( italien , américain , indien . . . . ) et une assiette plutôt généreuse . merci pour ce repas que j ' ai bien apprécié . seul petit bémol , la salle est plutôt petite et souvent pleine , mais après une petite attente la patronne trouve toujours une table .
text.en: food good but not exceptional, the shrimp kribienne was much better at the chute de la lobe restaurant very clean, very nice place on the beach professional staff price too high

text.fr: les proprios sont des amis donc niveau objectivité on reviendra . rien que pour l ' accueil il faut venir ! ! ! la nourriture est variée , il y en a pour tous les goûts ! service rapide et rapport qualité / prix imbattable à douala !
text.en: clean, chic but relaxed, excellent braised sole! Very friendly staff, idyllic setting with your feet in the water in the moonlight. . . . valid ! ! !

text.fr: ce petit restaurant est très agréable et l ' accueil y est de qualité . la carte donne envie et les assiettes sont assez copieuses . j ' y reviendrai certainement .
text.en: Quite remarkable restaurant: a lot of research in decoration, refined dishes, attentive staff. the terrace is very pleasant facing the sea. What a joy to have a restaurant of this level in Kribi where quality establishments are not legion. A favorite !

text.fr: bonnes acceuil , bonnes cuisine et très diverse prix abordable . les enfants adorent , les bonnes pâtes , pizza . . . le dimanche de bons brunch . . . .
text.en: what more can I say, fast and perfect service, food of perfect quality and in sufficient quantity. a fitting addition, a splendid setting. a discreet and quality musician, excellent toilets to recommend: the tournedos with pepper sauce when you can't get enough of the succulent garlic or kribienne shrimp. ah yes a fault, the Breton boss was not there! so we will come back. .

text.fr: accueil chaleureux nourriture bonne pizza tres bonne prix abordable . nous y sommes allés le soir . c est relaxe pas trop bonde
text.en: one of the best kribi restaurants. exceptional setting. good welcome, good food, superb pizzas. fast and careful service. beautiful view of the sea, feet in the water. clean restaurant, staff available and smiling. a big thank you to January the pizza chef, to Olivier, Sandrine and the others. they will recognize . the spicy ginger shrimp we loved. the children loved the pizzas. I recommend the pleasure of taste. Don't forget to also visit the Lobé Falls and the Pygmy Camp. see you soon .

text.fr: chez paul ( le patron ) vous mangez ce que vous voulez . le mieux ( personnellement ) c ' est de manger indien car paul est indien . demandez conseil et faites lui confiance les yeux fermés . extra ! ! ! !
text.en: no restaurant worthy of the name; in Kribi except probably the 2 cities, the rest does not serve as real professional cuisine. pleasure of taste is feet in the water and excellent

text.fr: j ' y suis allée avec ma famille et des amis j ' ai pris le filet de capitaine , du riz c ' était super bon a refaire souvent ! ! ! !
text.en: nice restaurant, simple, service is average, pizzas are good. The restaurant is equipped with a TV so you can watch football matches. there is a terrace and in general the restaurant is spacious.

text.fr: excellente nourritue , excellent service , ambiance géniale ! nous avons passé une soirée absolument magnifique . je vous le recommande fortement
text.en: nothing to say about the dishes, everything is good in the morning, at noon, in the afternoon and in the evening. and to top it all off, a splendid view of the sea, the restaurant divided into 2 while forming a restaurant gives you the choice between being in the whole restaurant and being under the trees while facing the sea! ! ! and the name of the restaurant is perfect, it’s a real pleasure not only for the taste but also for the eyes! ! !

text.fr: on m ' avait vanté les mérites de ce restaurant . au final , très décevant . . . j ' espère que le cuisinier habituel était en vacances parce que si la qualité est toujours la même , je ne comprends absolument pas les commentaires dithyrambiques . . . c ' est franchement très quelconque , les matières premières sont passables et les assaisonnements pas dignes d ' un vrai cuisinier . a refaire après la période des congés d ' été ?
text.en: the menu is very varied, the dishes are copious; good service and welcoming; the restaurant is located in the immediate vicinity of the water, the terrace has been redone and enlarged

text.fr: endroit sympa vite fait au niveau de la deco plats délicieux et très bourratifs la bouffé indienne y est trop bonne la gérante est très avenante et gentille . les plats du jour sont pour la plupart au dessus de 5000 f . un peu cher quand même mais je recommande cet endroit de douala pour des moments de papilles entre amis en famille ou déjeuner pro .
text.en: well visited by Europeans visiting Kribi. a good address with a varied menu, impeccable service and atmosphere. the manager took a lot of trouble with the decoration. to must of you are around. . .

text.fr: le staff est accueillant et la cuisine est magnifique . . . et c ' est le seul restaurant ou tout ce qui est sur la carte se trouve reelement dans je restaurant . . .
text.en: really an excellent fork to recommend and at a reasonable price, excellent value for money, large enough not to feel cornered by a neighbor at the table, very original decor, merchant marine style which brings out the opulent and natural feel of the setting, and that say the breakfast by the beach, a real treat, on the negative side! ! ! boffff not much, I'll have to come back and look, we'll see next time

text.fr: voici sans conteste mon restaurant préféré . service impeccable , plat succulent et des serveuses vraiment accueillantes . des plats variés pour 5 des 6 continents du monde . seul bémol une petite lenteur dans le service . . sinon , c ' est le meilleur restaurant .
text.en: one of the few classy restaurants between Douala and Yaoundé. very professional, good cuisine, prices depending on the choices, excellent fish and also great wood-fired pizzas

text.fr: en semaine à midi avec un client , ou le dimanche en famille , nous passons toujours une très bon moment aux 5 fourchettes qui est d ' ailleurs devenu le resto préféré de toute la famille . convivial , avec une carte variée mêlant la cuisine québécoise , française et indienne pour de délicieuses découvertes en fonction de nos humeurs , un très bon rapport qualité prix et un accueil très sympathique : nous le recommandons à tout le monde .
text.en: pleasant restaurant, clean and beautiful decoration (Breton style!) the cuisine is good and the service pleasant and well done. we eat by the sea. . .

text.fr: pour en avoir fait les frais , je ne recommande à personne cette cuisine pas fraîche et même trop grasse du reste , bref a eviter
text.en: the opening of the pizza corner was awaited by my children. what a surprise when tasting to find tomato concentrate in the bottom of the pizza. Is this a Kribian specialty? let's talk a little about the topping of the "gigite" pizza (the one I ate) with shrimp and fresh tuna: where is the tuna? 4 or 5 small crumbs scattered with the same number of shrimp! ! ! frankly disappointed. very expensive breakfast compared to the quality and quantity: mediocre coffee, no fresh fruit juice, two small mediocre pastries and a few slices of baguette, butter and jam. a little positive with the setting and the restaurant which are very nice, staff available and friendly.

text.fr: l ' accueil est vraiment bien , tout le personnel de service est souriant et accueillant . le restaurant est plutôt agréable . la carte est variée , détaillée , il y en a largement pour tout les goûts . les quantités sont très satisfaisantes , les plats sont bien consistant , bien préparé , on repart de cet endroit le ventre plein . le prix sont vraiment plus que raisonnable . petit plus pour le chef cuisinier qui vient en personne nous conseiller . nous avons suivi ses recommandations et n ' avons pas été déçu ! un restaurant à recommander . . .
text.en: everything is professional, nothing to say, beautiful establishment and team in the kitchen and dining room who "reassure" about the quality of the dishes with fresh, well-crafted products - a bit of a wait on Saturday but peanuts waiting for the dish! you can see the cooks at work in a clean, stainless steel kitchen and it doesn't stop

text.fr: le service est rapide les pizza sont juste whaou l ' accueil est trop top on ne se croirait pas à douala à vrai dire je recommande vivement excellent rapport qualité prix
text.en: on the terrace with your feet in the water a good mixed grill! impeccable service and inventive cuisine for an excellent time. the Breton boss obviously loves the sea; decor and map to see absolutely

text.fr: etrange d ' apprécier la cuisine indienne au coeur de l ' afrique . c ' est frais , c ' est bon le service est rapide et souriant . what else ? ?
text.en: big problem, half of the dishes are missing on a menu which is already not very extensive. average kitchen. avoid the beef steak, the piece is 5 cm2

text.fr: atmosphère décontracté pour déguster les 5 continents . le service est rapide et les prix sont très correct .
text.en: our chef Ludo came specially from France to bring his experience after having run quality restaurants in different countries. we are adapting little by little to the particular requirements of the country, the restaurant having only been open recently. you should know that quality products are only found in Douala (except fish, for which we must still ensure perfect freshness, past experiences showing that many do not hesitate to resell already dating products without any inconvenience, not having any quality controls like in France for example) we had to make an express return trip (400 km) to supply ourselves due to the large number of (satisfied) customers who frequented the restaurant. succeed in offering kribi quality cooking is learned and we sincerely hope that our customers are very satisfied even if it means refusing to offer them certain local products that do not meet our criteria.

text.fr: cuisine européenne variée , buffet barbecue le jeudi soir près de la piscine , buffet du midi renouvelé chaque jour , gambas tigrées au barbecue , crevettes à l ' ail , osso bouco , boeuf aux olives , sole , filet de capitaine , andouillette , ratatouille , et bien d ' autres plats tous excellents !
text.en: the best restaurant San Marco and the marina places where you feel good, difficult to appreciate the other restaurants, the service and the food different every day and the tourista is often there the next day so security is required with the san marco and the marina, and the fish market

text.fr: bon rapport qualité prix pour ce restaurant avec une carte assez large , les plats indiens sont très bien
text.en: We stayed in 2 Kribi lodges and this is their restaurant. the staff is very warm and professional. the food is very good . There are just as many Cameronian restaurants and the pizzas were prepared in a wooden oven.

text.fr: c ' est mon restaurant indien préféré . its the best . j ' y vais a chaque fois que je veux manger épicé . la gérante est sympa . le cadre convivial . bon rapport qualité prix . faites y un tour .
text.en: good day . thanks for your good review . we are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and all our team want to thank you you will be always welcome with our new menus to let you discover new tastes .
